Just the Wind.name: Just the Wind
Just the Wind.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Just the Wind.original_text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its converted mana cost. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

foreign_names.name: Nur der Wind
foreign_names.text:
Bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
Wahnsinn {U} (Falls du diese Karte abwirfst, wirf sie ins Exil ab. Wenn du dies tust, wirke sie für ihre Wahnsinn-Kosten oder lege sie auf deinen Friedhof.)
foreign_names.flavor: „Es gibt nichts, wovor du dich fürchten müsstest."

foreign_names.name: Solo es el viento
foreign_names.text:
Regresa la criatura objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
Demencia {U}. (Si descartas esta carta, exíliala. Cuando lo hagas, lánzala por su coste de demencia o ponla en tu cementerio.)
foreign_names.flavor: "No hay nada de qué preocuparse".

foreign_names.name: Rien que le vent
foreign_names.text:
Renvoyez la créature ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire.
Folie {U} (Si vous vous défaussez de cette carte, défaussez-vous en vers l'exil. Quand vous le faites, lancez-la pour son coût de folie ou mettez-la dans votre cimetière.)
foreign_names.flavor: « Il n'y a pas de quoi s'inquiéter. »

foreign_names.name: Solo il Vento
foreign_names.text:
Fai tornare una creatura bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
Follia {U} (Se scarti questa carta, scartala in esilio. Quando lo fai, lanciala pagando il suo costo di follia o mettila nel tuo cimitero.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Non c'è niente di cui preoccuparsi."

foreign_names.name: ただの風
foreign_names.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
マッドネス{U}（あなたがこのカードを捨てるなら、これを追放領域に捨てる。あなたがそうしたとき、マッドネス・コストでこれを唱えるか、これをあなたの墓地に置く。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「別に心配するようなことじゃないわ。」

foreign_names.name: 그냥 바람일 뿐
foreign_names.text:
생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
광기 {U} (이 카드를 버리는 경우, 추방 영역에 버린다. 그렇게 할 때, 광기 비용을 지불하고 이 카드를 발동하거나 당신의 무덤에 이 카드를 놓는다.)
foreign_names.flavor: "걱정할 거 없어."

foreign_names.name: Só o Vento
foreign_names.text:
Devolva a criatura alvo para a mão de seu dono.
Loucura {U} (Se você descartar este card, descarte-o para o exílio. Quando fizer isso, conjure-o por seu custo de loucura ou coloque-o em seu cemitério.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Não há nada com que se preocupar."

foreign_names.name: Просто Ветер
foreign_names.text:
Верните целевое существо в руку его владельца.
Бешенство {U} (Если вы сбрасываете эту карту, сбросьте ее в изгнание. Когда вы это делаете, разыграйте ее за ее стоимость Бешенства или положите на ваше кладбище.)
foreign_names.flavor: «Не стоит волноваться».

foreign_names.name: 误作清风
foreign_names.text:
将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。
疯魔{U}（如果你弃掉此牌，将之弃到放逐区。当你如此作时，支付其疯魔费用施放之，否则便将其置入你的坟墓场。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「没什么好担心的。」

foreign_names.name: 誤作清風
foreign_names.text:
將目標生物移回其擁有者手上。
瘋魔{U}（如果你棄掉此牌，將之棄到放逐區。當你如此作時，支付其瘋魔費用施放之，否則便將其置入你的墳墓場。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「沒什麼好擔心的。」

Lamplighter of Selhoff.name: Lamplighter of Selhoff
Lamplighter of Selhoff.text: When Lamplighter of Selhoff enters the battlefield, if you control another Zombie, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
Lamplighter of Selhoff.flavor: For stitchers and necro-alchemists, it's important that work can continue at all hours.
Lamplighter of Selhoff.original_text: When Lamplighter of Selhoff enters the battlefield, if you control another Zombie, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

foreign_names.name: Lampenanzünder aus Sehlhof
foreign_names.text: Wenn der Lampenanzünder aus Sehlhof ins Spiel kommt und falls du einen anderen Zombie kontrollierst, kannst du eine Karte ziehen. Falls du dies tust, wirf eine Karte ab.
foreign_names.flavor: Für Leichenflicker und Nekro-Alchemisten ist es wichtig, ihre Arbeit zu jeder Stunde fortsetzen zu können.

foreign_names.name: Lamparero de Selhoff
foreign_names.text: Cuando el Lamparero de Selhoff entre al campo de batalla, si controlas otro Zombie, puedes robar una carta. Si lo haces, descarta una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: Para los suturadores y los necro-alquimistas, es de suma importancia que el trabajo pueda continuar a todas horas.

foreign_names.name: Falotier de Selhoff
foreign_names.text: Quand le Falotier de Selhoff arrive sur le champ de bataille, si vous contrôlez un autre zombie, vous pouvez piocher une carte. Si vous faites ainsi, défaussez-vous d'une carte.
foreign_names.flavor: Les raccommodeurs et les nécro-alchimistes doivent pouvoir travailler à toute heure du jour et de la nuit.

foreign_names.name: Lampionaio di Selhoff
foreign_names.text: Quando il Lampionaio di Selhoff entra nel campo di battaglia, se controlli un altro Zombie, puoi pescare una carta. Se lo fai, scarta una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: Per i cucitori e i necro-alchimisti, è essenziale poter continuare a lavorare a qualsiasi ora.

foreign_names.name: セルホフのランプ灯し
foreign_names.text: セルホフのランプ灯しが戦場に出たとき、あなたが他のゾンビをコントロールしている場合、あなたはカードを１枚引いてもよい。そうしたなら、カード１枚を捨てる。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ・ホラー
foreign_names.flavor: 縫い師や屍錬金術師にとっては、終夜作業し続けられることが重要である。

foreign_names.name: 셀호프의 점등부
foreign_names.text: 셀호프의 점등부가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 다른 좀비를 조종한다면, 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑을 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 버린다.
foreign_names.flavor: 봉합술사와 사령연금술사는 끊임없이 일을 계속할 수 있다는 것을 중요하게 여긴다.

foreign_names.name: Acendedor de Lampiões de Selhoff
foreign_names.text: Quando Acendedor de Lampiões de Selhoff entrar no campo de batalha, se controlar outro Zumbi, você poderá comprar um card. Se fizer isso, descarte um card.
foreign_names.flavor: Para suturadores e necroalquimistas, é importante que o trabalho possa continuar o tempo inteiro.

foreign_names.name: Фонарщик из Селхоффа
foreign_names.text: Когда Фонарщик из Селхоффа выходит на поле битвы, если под вашим контролем есть другой Зомби, вы можете взять карту. Если вы это делаете, сбросьте карту.
foreign_names.flavor: Для сшивателей и некроалхимиков очень важно, чтобы работать было можно и по ночам.

foreign_names.name: 塞贺提灯怪
foreign_names.text: 当塞贺提灯怪进战场时，若你操控另一个灵俑，则你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 对于拼接师和死灵炼金术士而言，随时都能继续工作十分重要。

foreign_names.name: 塞賀提燈怪
foreign_names.text: 當塞賀提燈怪進戰場時，若你操控另一個殭屍，則你可以抽一張牌。若你如此作，則棄一張牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 對於拼接師和死靈鍊金術士而言，隨時都能繼續工作十分重要。

Manic Scribe.name: Manic Scribe
Manic Scribe.text:
When Manic Scribe enters the battlefield, each opponent mills three cards.
Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, that player mills three cards.
Manic Scribe.original_text:
When Manic Scribe enters the battlefield, each opponent puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, that player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

rulings.text: The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The upkeep step is before the draw step, after the untap step. Manic Scribe’s delirium ability mills an opponent’s library before that player draws a card during their draw step.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Most triggered delirium abilities use an intervening “if” clause. There must be four or more card types among cards in your graveyard in order for these abilities to trigger, otherwise they never trigger at all. There’s no way to have the ability trigger if there aren’t enough card types, even if you intend to raise that number in response to the triggered ability. The number of card types is checked again as the trigger resolves, and if it has become too low somehow, the ability does nothing. If which card types are in your graveyard changes but the quantity of card types stays the same (or increases), then the delirium triggered ability will still resolve.

foreign_names.name: Manische Schreiberin
foreign_names.text:
Wenn die Manische Schreiberin ins Spiel kommt, legt jeder Gegner die obersten drei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
Delirium — Zu Beginn des Versorgungssegments jedes Gegners und falls dein Friedhof vier oder mehr unterschiedliche Kartentypen enthält, legt dieser Spieler die obersten drei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.

foreign_names.name: Escriba maniática
foreign_names.text:
Cuando la Escriba maniática entre al campo de batalla, cada oponente pone las tres primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.
Delirio — Al comienzo del mantenimiento de cada oponente, si entre las cartas de tu cementerio hay cuatro o más tipos de cartas, ese jugador pone las tres primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.

foreign_names.name: Scribe maniaque
foreign_names.text:
Quand la Scribe maniaque arrive sur le champ de bataille, chaque adversaire met les trois cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
Délire — Au début de l'entretien de chaque adversaire, s'il y a au moins quatre types de carte parmi les cartes de votre cimetière, ce joueur met les trois cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.

foreign_names.name: Scrivana Compulsiva
foreign_names.text:
Quando la Scrivana Compulsiva entra nel campo di battaglia, ogni avversario mette nel proprio cimitero le prime tre carte del proprio grimorio.
Delirio — All'inizio del mantenimento di ogni avversario, se ci sono quattro o più tipi di carta tra le carte nel tuo cimitero, quel giocatore mette nel suo cimitero le prime tre carte del suo grimorio.

foreign_names.name: 躁の書記官
foreign_names.text:
躁の書記官が戦場に出たとき、各対戦相手はそれぞれ自分のライブラリーの一番上から３枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。
昂揚 ― 各対戦相手のアップキープの開始時に、あなたの墓地にあるカードにカード・タイプが合計４種類以上含まれる場合、そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上から３枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreign_names.name: 정신 나간 서기
foreign_names.text:
정신 나간 서기가 전장에 들어올 때, 각 상대는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 세 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
섬망 — 각 상대의 유지단 시작에, 당신의 무덤에 네 개 이상의 카드 유형이 있다면, 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 세 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.

foreign_names.name: Escriba Maníaco
foreign_names.text:
Quando Escriba Maníaco entra no campo de batalha, cada oponente coloca os três cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.
Delírio — No início da manutenção de cada oponente, se houver quatro ou mais tipos de card entre os cards de seu cemitério, aquele jogador coloca os três cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.

foreign_names.name: Рехнувшаяся Переписчица
foreign_names.text:
Когда Рехнувшаяся Переписчица выходит на поле битвы, каждый оппонент кладет три верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.
Буйство — В начале шага поддержки каждого оппонента, если среди карт на вашем кладбище есть не менее четырех типов карт, тот игрок кладет три верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.

foreign_names.name: 疯狂书吏
foreign_names.text:
当疯狂书吏进战场时，每位对手各将其牌库顶的三张牌置入其坟墓场。
躁狂～在每位对手的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，则该牌手将其牌库顶的三张牌置入其坟墓场。

foreign_names.name: 瘋狂書吏
foreign_names.text:
當瘋狂書吏進戰場時，每位對手各將其牌庫頂的三張牌置入其墳墓場。
躁狂～在每位對手的維持開始時，若你墳墓場中牌的類別有四種或更多，則該玩家將其牌庫頂的三張牌置入其墳墓場。

Nagging Thoughts.name: Nagging Thoughts
Nagging Thoughts.text:
Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
Madness {1}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Nagging Thoughts.original_text:
Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
Madness {1}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its converted mana cost. You just pay the madness cost instead.
If there is only one card left in your library, you’ll put it into your hand. You won’t lose the game for having zero cards in your library until you’re required to draw a card.
Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

foreign_names.name: Nagende Gedanken
foreign_names.text:
Schaue dir die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine davon auf deine Hand und lege die andere auf deinen Friedhof.
Wahnsinn {1}{U} (Falls du diese Karte abwirfst, wirf sie ins Exil ab. Wenn du dies tust, wirke sie für ihre Wahnsinn-Kosten oder lege sie auf deinen Friedhof.)

foreign_names.name: Pensamientos perturbadores
foreign_names.text:
Mira las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de ellas en tu mano y la otra en tu cementerio.
Demencia {1}{U}. (Si descartas esta carta, exíliala. Cuando lo hagas, lánzala por su coste de demencia o ponla en tu cementerio.)

foreign_names.name: Pensées tenaces
foreign_names.text:
Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez l'une d'entre elles dans votre main et l'autre dans votre cimetière.
Folie {1}{U} (Si vous vous défaussez de cette carte, défaussez-vous en vers l'exil. Quand vous le faites, lancez-la pour son coût de folie ou mettez-la dans votre cimetière.)

foreign_names.name: Pensieri Assillanti
foreign_names.text:
Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungine una alla tua mano e metti l'altra nel tuo cimitero.
Follia {1}{U} (Se scarti questa carta, scartala in esilio. Quando lo fai, lanciala pagando il suo costo di follia o mettila nel tuo cimitero.)

foreign_names.name: 収まらぬ思い
foreign_names.text:
あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを見る。そのうち１枚をあなたの手札に加え、もう１枚をあなたの墓地に置く。
マッドネス{1}{U}（あなたがこのカードを捨てるなら、これを追放領域に捨てる。あなたがそうしたとき、マッドネス・コストでこれを唱えるか、これをあなたの墓地に置く。）

foreign_names.name: 떠나지 않는 근심
foreign_names.text:
당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 본다. 그 중 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져가고 다른 한 장은 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
광기 {1}{U} (이 카드를 버리는 경우, 추방 영역에 버린다. 그렇게 할 때, 광기 비용을 지불하고 이 카드를 발동하거나 당신의 무덤에 이 카드를 놓는다.)

foreign_names.name: Pensamentos Incômodos
foreign_names.text:
Olhe os dois cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque um deles na sua mão e o restante em seu cemitério.
Loucura {1}{U} (Se você descartar este card, descarte-o para o exílio. Quando fizer isso, conjure-o por seu custo de loucura ou coloque-o em seu cemitério.)

foreign_names.name: Назойливые Мысли
foreign_names.text:
Посмотрите две верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Положите одну из них в вашу руку, а другую — на ваше кладбище.
Бешенство {1}{U} (Если вы сбрасываете эту карту, сбросьте ее в изгнание. Когда вы это делаете, разыграйте ее за ее стоимость Бешенства или положите на ваше кладбище.)

foreign_names.name: 叨扰乱神
foreign_names.text:
检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张置入你的坟墓场。
疯魔{1}{U}（如果你弃掉此牌，将之弃到放逐区。当你如此作时，支付其疯魔费用施放之，否则便将其置入你的坟墓场。）

foreign_names.name: 叨擾亂神
foreign_names.text:
檢視你牌庫頂的兩張牌。將其中一張置於你手上，另一張置入你的墳墓場。
瘋魔{1}{U}（如果你棄掉此牌，將之棄到放逐區。當你如此作時，支付其瘋魔費用施放之，否則便將其置入你的墳墓場。）

Nephalia Moondrakes.name: Nephalia Moondrakes
Nephalia Moondrakes.text:
Flying
When Nephalia Moondrakes enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{4}{U}{U}, Exile Nephalia Moondrakes from your graveyard: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
Nephalia Moondrakes.original_text:
Flying
When Nephalia Moondrakes enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{4}{U}{U}, Exile Nephalia Moondrakes from your graveyard: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

foreign_names.name: Nefälische Mondsceadas
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
Wenn die Nefälischen Mondsceadas ins Spiel kommen, erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl Flugfähigkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.
{4}{U}{U}, schicke die Nefälischen Mondsceadas aus deinem Friedhof ins Exil: Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten Flugfähigkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreign_names.name: Dracolunares de Nephalia
foreign_names.text:
Vuela.
Cuando los Dracolunares de Nephalia entren al campo de batalla, la criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.
{4}{U}{U}, exiliar a los Dracolunares de Nephalia de tu cementerio: Las criaturas que controlas ganan la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreign_names.name: Drakôns lunaires de Néphalie
foreign_names.text:
Vol

Ongoing Investigation.name: Ongoing Investigation
Ongoing Investigation.text:
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
{1}{G}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Investigate. You gain 2 life.
Ongoing Investigation.original_text:
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, investigate. (Put a colorless Clue artifact token onto the battlefield with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
{1}{G}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Investigate. You gain 2 life.

rulings.text: In a Two-Headed Giant game, if you control more than one creature that can attack, you may have them attack different opponents so that Ongoing Investigation’s first ability triggers twice.
The token is named Clue and has the artifact subtype Clue. Clue isn’t a creature type.
The tokens are normal artifacts. For example, they can be sacrificed to cast Angelic Purge or targeted by Root Out.
If you sacrifice a Clue for another card’s cost or effect, such as that of Angelic Purge or Tamiyo’s Journal, you can’t also pay {2} and sacrifice it to draw a card.

Press for Answers.name: Press for Answers

Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Press for Answers.original_text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Investigate. (Put a colorless Clue artifact token onto the battlefield with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

rulings.text: The token is named Clue and has the artifact subtype Clue. Clue isn’t a creature type.
The tokens are normal artifacts. For example, they can be sacrificed to cast Angelic Purge or targeted by Root Out.
If you sacrifice a Clue for another card’s cost or effect, such as that of Angelic Purge or Tamiyo’s Journal, you can’t also pay {2} and sacrifice it to draw a card.
You can’t cast a spell without choosing legal targets. If all of those targets become illegal, the spell doesn’t resolve and you won’t investigate.

foreign_names.name: 回答の強要
foreign_names.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。それは、そのコントローラーの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
調査を行う。（「{2}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：カードを１枚引く。」を持つ無色の手掛かり・アーティファクト・トークンを１つ戦場に出す。）

foreign_names.name: 답변 강요
foreign_names.text:
생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 탭되며 조종자의 다음 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.
조사한다. ("{2}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다."를 가진 무색 단서 마법물체 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.)

foreign_names.name: Exigir Respostas
foreign_names.text:
Vire a criatura alvo. Ela não desvira durante a próxima etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.
Investigue. (Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de artefato incolor do tipo Pista com "{2}, Sacrifique este artefato: Compre um card.")

foreign_names.name: Вытягивание Ответов
foreign_names.text:
Поверните целевое существо. Оно не разворачивается во время следующего шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.
Используйте Дознание. (Положите на поле битвы одну фишку бесцветного артефакта Улика со способностью «{2}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: возьмите карту».)

foreign_names.name: 强求解答
foreign_names.text:
横置目标生物。它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。
探查。（将一个无色线索衍生神器放进战场，且其具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌。」）

foreign_names.name: 強求解答
foreign_names.text:
橫置目標生物。它於其操控者的下一個重置步驟中不能重置。
探查。（將一個無色線索衍生神器放進戰場，且其具有「{2}，犧牲此神器：抽一張牌。」）

Rattlechains.name: Rattlechains
Rattlechains.text:
Flash
Flying
When Rattlechains enters the battlefield, target Spirit gains hexproof until end of turn.
You may cast Spirit spells as though they had flash.
Rattlechains.original_text:
Flash
Flying
When Rattlechains enters the battlefield, target Spirit gains hexproof until end of turn.
You may cast Spirit spells as though they had flash.

foreign_names.name: Kettenrassler
foreign_names.text:
Aufblitzen
Fliegend
Wenn der Kettenrassler ins Spiel kommt, erhält ein Geist deiner Wahl Fluchsicherheit bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Du kannst Geist-Zaubersprüche wirken, als ob sie Aufblitzen hätten.

foreign_names.name: Mecedor de cadenas
foreign_names.text:
Destello.
Vuela.
Cuando el Mecedor de cadenas entre al campo de batalla, el Espíritu objetivo gana la habilidad de antimaleficio hasta el final del turno.
Puedes lanzar los hechizos de Espíritu como si tuvieran la habilidad de destello.

foreign_names.name: Tintechaînes
foreign_names.text:
Flash
Vol
Quand le Tintechaînes arrive sur le champ de bataille, l'esprit ciblé acquiert la défense talismanique jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Vous pouvez lancer les sorts d'esprit comme s'ils avaient le flash.

foreign_names.name: Scuoticatene
foreign_names.text:
Lampo
Volare
Quando lo Scuoticatene entra nel campo di battaglia, uno Spirito bersaglio ha anti-malocchio fino alla fine del turno.
Puoi lanciare magie Spirito come se avessero lampo.

foreign_names.name: 鎖鳴らし
foreign_names.text:
瞬速
飛行
鎖鳴らしが戦場に出たとき、スピリット１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは呪禁を得る。
あなたはスピリット・呪文を、それが瞬速を持っているかのように唱えてもよい。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreign_names.name: 사슬심령
foreign_names.text:
섬광
비행
사슬심령이 전장에 들어올 때, 신령을 목표로 정한다. 그 신령은 턴종료까지 방호를 얻는다.
당신은 신령 주문을 섬광을 가진 것처럼 발동할 수 있다.

foreign_names.name: Sacode-correntes
foreign_names.text:
Lampejo
Voar
Quando Sacode-correntes entra no campo de batalha, o Espírito alvo ganha resistência a magia até o final do turno.
Você pode conjurar mágicas de Espírito como se elas tivessem lampejo.

foreign_names.name: Цепезвон
foreign_names.text:
Миг
Полет
Когда Цепезвон выходит на поле битвы, целевой Дух получает Порчеустойчивость до конца хода.
Вы можете разыгрывать заклинания Духов, как будто у них есть Миг.

foreign_names.name: 缀链灵
foreign_names.text:
闪现
飞行
当缀链灵进战场时，目标精怪获得辟邪异能直到回合结束。
你可以将精怪咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

foreign_names.name: 綴鏈靈
foreign_names.text:
閃現
飛行
當綴鏈靈進戰場時，目標精靈獲得辟邪異能直到回合結束。
你可以將精靈咒語視同具有閃現異能地來施放。

Reckless Scholar.name: Reckless Scholar
Reckless Scholar.text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.
Reckless Scholar.original_text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.

foreign_names.name: Rücksichtsloser Gelehrter
foreign_names.text: {T}: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zieht eine Karte und wirft dann eine Karte ab.
foreign_names.flavor: Fortschritt hat seinen Preis.

foreign_names.name: Erudito temerario
foreign_names.text: {T}: El jugador objetivo roba una carta y luego descarta una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: El progreso tiene un precio.

foreign_names.name: Érudit téméraire
foreign_names.text: {T} : Le joueur ciblé pioche une carte et se défausse ensuite d'une carte.
foreign_names.flavor: Le progrès a un prix.

foreign_names.name: Studioso Imprudente
foreign_names.text: {T}: Un giocatore bersaglio pesca una carta, poi scarta una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: Il progresso ha un prezzo.

foreign_names.name: 無謀な識者
foreign_names.text: {T}：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを１枚引き、その後カード１枚を捨てる。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード
foreign_names.flavor: 進歩には、犠牲が付きものである。

foreign_names.name: 무모한 학자
foreign_names.text: {T}: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 카드 한 장을 뽑은 후 카드 한 장을 버린다.
foreign_names.flavor: 진보에는 대가가 따른다.

foreign_names.name: Erudito Incauto
foreign_names.text: {T}: O jogador alvo compra um card e depois descarta um card.
foreign_names.flavor: O progresso tem um preço.

foreign_names.name: Безрассудный Ученый
foreign_names.text: {T}: целевой игрок берет карту, затем сбрасывает карту.
foreign_names.flavor: Прогресс имеет свою цену.

foreign_names.name: 鲁莽学者
foreign_names.text: {T}：目标牌手抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 付出代价才能进步。

foreign_names.name: 魯莽學者
foreign_names.text: {T}：目標玩家抽一張牌，然後棄一張牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 付出代價才能進步。

Rise from the Tides.name: Rise from the Tides
Rise from the Tides.text: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
Rise from the Tides.flavor:
"Dear brother, it's sweet that you have chosen to share your toys with Ludevic, but I too have found some new playmates."
—Ghoulcaller Gisa
Rise from the Tides.original_text: Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield tapped for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Rise from the Tides is still on the stack while you count the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. It doesn’t count itself.

foreign_names.name: Den Fluten entsteigen
foreign_names.text: Bringe für jede Spontanzauber- und Hexerei-Karte in deinem Friedhof einen 2/2 schwarzen Zombie-Kreaturenspielstein getappt ins Spiel.
foreign_names.flavor: „Liebster Bruder, es ist nett, dass du dein Spielzeug mit Ludevic teilen willst, aber auch ich habe neue Spielkameraden gefunden." —Gisa die Ghulruferin

foreign_names.name: Alzarse de entre las mareas
foreign_names.text: Pon en el campo de batalla girada una ficha de criatura Zombie negra 2/2 por cada carta de instantáneo y de conjuro en tu cementerio.
foreign_names.flavor: "Querido hermano, es un detalle que hayas compartido tus juguetes con Ludevic, pero yo también encontré nuevos compañeros de juego". —Gisa, la llamamuertos

foreign_names.name: Émergence des vagues
foreign_names.text: Mettez sur le champ de bataille, engagé, un jeton de créature 2/2 noire Zombie pour chaque carte d'éphémère et de rituel dans votre cimetière.
foreign_names.flavor: « Mon cher frère, je me réjouis que tu aies décidé de partager tes jouets avec Ludevic, car j'ai moi aussi trouvé de nouveaux compagnons de jeu. » —Gisa, meneuse de goule

foreign_names.name: Emergere dai Flutti
foreign_names.text: Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Zombie 2/2 nera TAPpata per ogni carta istantaneo e stregoneria nel tuo cimitero.
foreign_names.flavor: "Caro fratello, mi rallegra che tu abbia scelto di condividere i tuoi giocattoli con Ludevic, ma anch'io ho trovato qualche nuovo compagno di giochi." —Gisa l'evocaghoul

foreign_names.name: 潮からの蘇生
foreign_names.text: あなたの墓地にあるインスタント・カードとソーサリー・カードの合計に等しい数の、黒の２/２のゾンビ・クリーチャー・トークンをタップ状態で戦場に出す。
foreign_names.flavor: 「愛する弟へ。 貴方の玩具をルーデヴィックと分け合うことにしたのはさぞ楽しかろうと思います。そうそう、私も新しい遊び相手を見つけたところなのですよ。」 ――グール呼びのギサ

foreign_names.name: 조류에서의 귀환
foreign_names.text: 당신의 무덤에 있는 순간마법 및 집중마법 카드 한 장당 2/2 흑색 좀비 생물 토큰 한 개를 탭된 채로 전장에 놓는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "친애하는 동생아, 네 장난감들을 루데비치와 공유하기로 했다니 참으로 잘됐구나. 나 역시 쓸만한 새로운 놀잇감을 찾아냈단다." —악귀소환술사 기샤

foreign_names.name: Erguer-se das Marés
foreign_names.text: Coloque no campo de batalha virada uma ficha de criatura preta 2/2 do tipo Zumbi para cada card de mágica instantânea ou feitiço em seu cemitério.
foreign_names.flavor: "Caro irmão, é muito gentil da sua parte compartilhar seus brinquedos com Ludevic, mas eu também encontrei alguns colegas novos para brincar." — Invocadora de carniçais Gisa

foreign_names.name: Восстать из Волн
foreign_names.text: Положите на поле битвы повернутой одну фишку существа 2/2 черный Зомби за каждую карту мгновенного заклинания и волшебства на вашем кладбище.
foreign_names.flavor: «Дорогой братец! Я рада, что ты решил поделиться своими игрушками с Людевиком, но и я тоже нашла новых товарищей по играм». — призывательница упырей Джиза

foreign_names.name: 浪潮复生
foreign_names.text: 你坟墓场中每有一张瞬间与法术牌，便将一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物横置放进战场。
foreign_names.flavor: 「亲爱的弟弟，你把自己的玩具和卢德维一起分享真是好心，不过我也找到了一些新玩伴。」 ～尸鬼牧者基沙

foreign_names.name: 浪潮復生
foreign_names.text: 你墳墓場中每有一張瞬間與巫術牌，便將一個2/2黑色殭屍衍生生物橫置放進戰場。
foreign_names.flavor: 「親愛的弟弟，你把自己的玩具和盧德維一起分享真是好心，不過我也找到了一些新玩伴。」 ～屍鬼牧者基沙

Seagraf Skaab.name: Seagraf Skaab
Seagraf Skaab.flavor:
"Your recent work is an inspiration. I have the utmost respect for your approach, and your craft is impeccable. At your convenience, I would be honored to collaborate on a project."
—Ludevic, letter to Geralf

foreign_names.name: Seegrab-Skaab
foreign_names.flavor: „Eure jüngsten Kreationen sind eine Inspiration. Ich habe größten Respekt für Eure Methoden und Euer Werk ist fehlerlos. Es wäre mir eine Ehre, mit Ihnen bei einem Projekt zu kooperieren, wenn es Ihnen zeitlich möglich wäre." —Ludevic, Brief an Geralf

foreign_names.name: Skaab de tumbamarina
foreign_names.flavor: "Tu trabajo reciente es una inspiración. Respeto al máximo tu enfoque, y la artesanía es impecable. Cuando puedas, sería un honor para mí que colaborásemos juntos en un proyecto". —Ludevic, carta a Geralf

foreign_names.name: Skaab du seegraf
foreign_names.flavor: « Vos récents travaux sont une grande source d'inspiration. J'ai le plus grand respect pour vos démarches, et votre art est magistral. Je me tiens à votre disposition pour toute collaboration, si vous acceptez de m'en faire l'honneur. » —Ludevic, lettre à Geralf

foreign_names.name: Skaab del Cimitero Marino
foreign_names.flavor: "Le tue opere recenti sono un'ispirazione. Nutro il massimo rispetto per il tuo approccio e la tua tecnica è impeccabile. Qualora lo desiderassi, sarei onorato di collaborare a un progetto comune." —Ludevic, lettera a Geralf

foreign_names.name: 海墓のスカーブ
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ
foreign_names.flavor: 「貴君の新作は感銘の至り。その技法に最大限の賛辞を贈る。あれこそ至高の名に相応しい。余は近時、其方の研究への参画の栄誉に浴すを欲するものなり。」 ――ルーデヴィックからゲラルフへの書簡

foreign_names.name: 바다묘지 스캅
foreign_names.flavor: "그대가 최근에 만든 작품은 내게 큰 영감을 주었소. 그대의 발상에 최고의 경의를 표하는 바이오. 그대의 기술은 완벽 그 자체였소. 빠른 시기에 그대와 함께 일할 수 있다면 내게는 더 없는 영광일 것이오." —루데비치가 게랄프에게 보내는 편지

foreign_names.name: Skaab do Cemitério Marinho
foreign_names.flavor: "Seu trabalho recente é inspirador. Tenho imenso respeito pela sua abordagem, e sua arte é impecável. Conforme sua conveniência, seria uma honra colaborar em um projeto." — Ludevic, em carta a Geralf

foreign_names.name: Скааб из Морского Могильника
foreign_names.flavor: «Ваша последняя работа стала для меня источником вдохновения! Я с большим почтением отношусь к Вашим методам и безупречному мастерству. Почту за честь работать вместе с Вами, когда Вам будет угодно». — Людевик, в письме Геральфу

foreign_names.name: 海墓尸嵌
foreign_names.flavor: 「您近期的作品对我启发甚大。我对您的手法表示无上敬意，而您的做工更是无可挑剔。若您不嫌弃，能与您共事将是我的莫大荣幸。」 ～卢德维致基拉夫

foreign_names.name: 海墓屍嵌
foreign_names.flavor: 「您近期的作品對我啟發甚大。我對您的手法表示無上敬意，而您的做工更是無可挑剔。若您不嫌棄，能與您共事將是我的莫大榮幸。」 ～盧德維致基拉夫

Silburlind Snapper.name: Silburlind Snapper
Silburlind Snapper.text: Silburlind Snapper can't attack unless you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.
Silburlind Snapper.flavor: Nephalia is home to many hard-shelled creatures of unusual size, the largest of which are either avoided or worshipped.
Silburlind Snapper.original_text: Silburlind Snapper can't attack unless you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.

rulings.text: It doesn’t matter whether the noncreature spell resolved or was countered, as long as it was cast.

foreign_names.name: Silburlind-Schnapper
foreign_names.text: Der Silburlind-Schnapper kann nicht angreifen, es sei denn, du hast in diesem Zug bereits einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch gewirkt.
foreign_names.flavor: Nefalen ist die Heimat zahlloser gepanzerter Kreaturen von ungewöhnlicher Größe, von denen die gigantischsten entweder gemieden oder angebetet werden.

foreign_names.name: Desmenuzador del Silburlind
foreign_names.text: El Desmenuzador del Silburlind no puede atacar a menos que hayas lanzado un hechizo que no sea de criatura este turno.
foreign_names.flavor: Nephalia alberga muchas criaturas con caparazón duro inusualmente grandes, y a las mayores de ellas se las evita o se las adora.

foreign_names.name: Claqueur de la Silburlind
foreign_names.text: Le Claqueur de la Silburlind ne peut pas attaquer à moins que vous n'ayez lancé un sort non-créature ce tour-ci.
foreign_names.flavor: La Néphalie abrite de nombreuses créatures à carapaces dures de tailles inhabituelles, dont les plus grands spécimens sont fuis ou adulés.

foreign_names.name: Mordace del Silburlind
foreign_names.text: Il Mordace del Silburlind non può attaccare a meno che tu non abbia lanciato una magia non creatura in questo turno.
foreign_names.flavor: Nephalia ospita innumerevoli creature corazzate di dimensioni insolite. In genere, gli esemplari più grandi vengono evitati o venerati.

foreign_names.name: シルブールリンドのカミツキガメ
foreign_names.text: あなたがこのターンにクリーチャーでない呪文を唱えていないかぎり、シルブールリンドのカミツキガメでは攻撃できない。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 海亀
foreign_names.flavor: ネファリアは甲羅を持つ巨大な生物の宝庫である。その最も大きなものは、忌避されたり崇拝されたりしている。

foreign_names.name: 실버린드 거북
foreign_names.text: 당신이 이번 턴에 생물이 아닌 주문을 발동하지 않았다면, 실버린드 거북은 공격할 수 없다.
foreign_names.flavor: 네팔리아에는 단단한 껍질을 두른 엄청난 크기의 생물들이 아주 많다. 그 중에서 가장 큰 생물은 피하거나 숭배된다.

foreign_names.name: Abocanhador de Silburlind
foreign_names.text: Abocanhador de Silburlind não pode atacar a menos que você tenha conjurado uma mágica que não seja de criatura neste turno.
foreign_names.flavor: Nefália é o lar de muitas criaturas de tamanho incomum com duras carapaças, e as maiores ou são evitadas ou cultuadas.

foreign_names.name: Силбурлиндский Кусака
foreign_names.text: Силбурлиндский Кусака не может атаковать, если только вы не разыграли не являющееся существом заклинание в этом ходу.
foreign_names.flavor: В Нефалии водятся самые разные толстокожие существа колоссальных размеров. Самых больших тварей либо избегают, либо боготворят.

foreign_names.name: 西布林巨嘴龟
foreign_names.text: 除非你本回合中施放过非生物咒语，否则西布林巨嘴龟不能攻击。
foreign_names.flavor: 涅非利亚是众多巨型硬壳生物的家园，对于最大的那一头，人们或退避三舍，或心怀敬意。

foreign_names.name: 西布林巨嘴龜
foreign_names.text: 除非你本回合中施放過非生物咒語，否則西布林巨嘴龜不能攻擊。
foreign_names.flavor: 涅非利亞是眾多巨型硬殼生物的家園，對於最大的那一頭，人們或退避三舍，或心懷敬意。

Silent Observer.name: Silent Observer
Silent Observer.flavor: It's not just a feeling—you *are* being watched.

foreign_names.name: Stiller Beobachter
foreign_names.text: Fliegend
foreign_names.flavor: Es ist keine Einbildung — du wirst beobachtet.

foreign_names.name: Observador silencioso
foreign_names.text: Vuela.
foreign_names.flavor: No es solo una sensación: te están observando.

foreign_names.name: Observateur silencieux
foreign_names.text: Vol
foreign_names.flavor: Ce n'est pas qu'une impression... vous êtes observé.

foreign_names.name: Osservatore Silenzioso
foreign_names.text: Volare
foreign_names.flavor: Non è solo una sensazione: ti stanno davvero osservando.

foreign_names.name: 沈黙の観察者
foreign_names.text: 飛行
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — スピリット
foreign_names.flavor: 気のせいなどではない。君は見張られているのだ。

foreign_names.name: 조용한 관찰자
foreign_names.text: 비행
foreign_names.flavor: 느낌만으로 말하는 게 아냐. 누군가 너를 감시하고 있어.

foreign_names.name: Observador Silencioso
foreign_names.text: Voar
foreign_names.flavor: Não é só impressão — você está sendo observado.

foreign_names.name: Безмолвный Наблюдатель
foreign_names.text: Полет
foreign_names.flavor: Это не просто ощущение. На тебя действительно кто-то смотрит.

foreign_names.name: 寂静观客
foreign_names.text: 飞行
foreign_names.flavor: 这并不是错觉～你确实被监视着。

foreign_names.name: 寂靜觀客
foreign_names.text: 飛行
foreign_names.flavor: 這並不是錯覺～你確實被監視著。

Sleep Paralysis.name: Sleep Paralysis
Sleep Paralysis.text:
Enchant creature
When Sleep Paralysis enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
Sleep Paralysis.original_text:
Enchant creature
When Sleep Paralysis enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

rulings.text: If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Sleep Paralysis tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. It won’t enter the battlefield, so its ability won’t trigger.

foreign_names.name: Schlafparalyse
foreign_names.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Wenn die Schlafparalyse ins Spiel kommt, tappe die verzauberte Kreatur.
Die verzauberte Kreatur enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.
foreign_names.flavor: Schlaf verheißt nicht immer Erholung.

foreign_names.name: Parálisis del sueño
foreign_names.text:
Encantar criatura.
Cuando la Parálisis del sueño entre al campo de batalla, gira la criatura encantada.
La criatura encantada no se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador.
foreign_names.flavor: Dormir no siempre es sinónimo de descanso.

foreign_names.name: Paralysie du sommeil
foreign_names.text:
Enchanter : créature
Quand la Paralysie du sommeil arrive sur le champ de bataille, engagez la créature enchantée.
La créature enchantée ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.
foreign_names.flavor: Le sommeil n'est pas toujours reposant.

foreign_names.name: Paralisi nel Sonno
foreign_names.text:
Incanta creatura
Quando la Paralisi nel Sonno entra nel campo di battaglia, TAPpa la creatura incantata.
La creatura incantata non STAPpa durante lo STAP del suo controllore.
foreign_names.flavor: Non sempre il sonno è sinonimo di riposo.

foreign_names.name: 金縛り
foreign_names.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
金縛りが戦場に出たとき、エンチャントされているクリーチャーをタップする。
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
foreign_names.type: エンチャント — オーラ
foreign_names.flavor: 眠りが常に休息を意味するとは限らない。

foreign_names.name: 수면 마비
foreign_names.text:
생물에게 부여
수면 마비가 전장에 들어올 때, 부여된 생물을 탭한다.
부여된 생물은 조종자의 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 수면이 반드시 휴식을 의미하지는 않는다.

foreign_names.name: Paralisia do Sono
foreign_names.text:
Encantar criatura
Quando Paralisia do Sono entrar no campo de batalha, vire a criatura encantada.
A criatura encantada não é desvirada durante a etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.
foreign_names.flavor: Dormir nem sempre significa descansar.

foreign_names.name: Сонный Паралич
foreign_names.text:
Зачаровать существо
Когда Сонный Паралич выходит на поле битвы, поверните зачарованное существо.
Зачарованное существо не разворачивается во время шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.
foreign_names.flavor: Сон не всегда приносит отдых.

foreign_names.name: 睡眠瘫痪症
foreign_names.text:
结附于生物
当睡眠瘫痪症进战场时，横置所结附的生物。
所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。
foreign_names.flavor: 睡眠并不都意味着休息。

foreign_names.name: 睡眠癱瘓症
foreign_names.text:
結附於生物
當睡眠癱瘓症進戰場時，橫置所結附的生物。
所結附的生物於其操控者的重置步驟中不能重置。
foreign_names.flavor: 睡眠並不都意味著休息。

Startled Awake // Persistent Nightmare.name: Startled Awake // Persistent Nightmare
Startled Awake // Persistent Nightmare.text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
When Persistent Nightmare deals combat damage to a player, return it to its owner's hand.
Startled Awake // Persistent Nightmare.original_text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
When Persistent Nightmare deals combat damage to a player, return it to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Skulk matters only as blockers are chosen. Modifying either creature’s power after blockers are chosen won’t cause the attacking creature to become unblocked.

If you cause a creature to have 0 power or less, use the actual value (which may be negative) to determine whether it can block or be blocked. A creature with skulk and 0 or less power most likely won’t be blocked, but it won’t deal combat damage and won’t trigger any abilities that trigger when combat damage is dealt.

A sorcery can’t be put onto the battlefield and a permanent can’t transform into a sorcery. If an effect exiles Persistent Nightmare and then instructs you to return it to the battlefield, it remains face up in exile (unless that effect instructs you to put it onto the battlefield transformed, in which case it returns as Persistent Nightmare). If an effect instructs you to transform Persistent Nightmare, the instruction is ignored.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

foreign_names.name: Aus dem Schlaf gerissen // Beständiger Albtraum
foreign_names.text:
Schleichen (Diese Kreatur kann von Kreaturen mit größerer Stärke nicht geblockt werden.)
Wenn der Beständige Albtraum einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, bringe ihn auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück.
foreign_names.flavor: „Es schien so echt!"

foreign_names.name: Despertar súbito // Pesadilla persistente
foreign_names.text:
Escurridizo. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada por criaturas con mayor fuerza que ella.)
Cuando la Pesadilla persistente haga daño de combate a un jugador, regrésala a la mano de su propietario.
foreign_names.flavor: "¡Parecía tan real!"

foreign_names.name: Éveil en sursaut // Cauchemar permanent
foreign_names.text:
Furtivité (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée par des créatures de force supérieure.)
Quand le Cauchemar permanent inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, renvoyez-le dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreign_names.flavor: « Cela semblait si réel ! »

foreign_names.name: Risveglio Spaventato // Incubo Persistente
foreign_names.text:
Furtivo (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata da creature con forza superiore.)
Quando l'Incubo Persistente infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, fallo tornare in mano al suo proprietario.
foreign_names.flavor: "Sembrava così reale!"

foreign_names.name: 驚恐の目覚め // 絶え間ない悪夢
foreign_names.text:
潜伏（このクリーチャーは、これより大きなパワーを持つクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。）
絶え間ない悪夢がプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えたとき、これをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー ― - ナイトメア
foreign_names.flavor: 「まるで現実のようだったわ。」

foreign_names.name: 깜짝 놀라 깨기 // 계속되는 악몽
foreign_names.text:
은폐 (이 생물은 더 높은 공격력을 가진 생물에게 방어될 수 없다.)
계속되는 악몽이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때, 계속되는 악몽을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreign_names.flavor: "진짜 같이 너무 생생했어!"

foreign_names.name: Acordar no Susto // Pesadelo Persistente
foreign_names.text:
Esquivo (Esta criatura não pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com poder superior ao dela.)
Quando Pesadelo Persistente causar dano de combate a um jogador, devolva-o para a mão de seu dono.
foreign_names.flavor: "Pareceu tão real!"

foreign_names.name: Внезапное Пробуждение // Стойкий Кошмар
foreign_names.text:
Скрытность (Это существо не может быть заблокировано существами с большей силой.)
Когда Стойкий Кошмар наносит боевые повреждения игроку, верните его в руку его владельца.
foreign_names.flavor: «Он был совсем как настоящий!»

foreign_names.name: 受惊而醒 // 不散梦魇
foreign_names.text:
潜匿（此生物不能被力量比它大的生物阻挡。）
当不散梦魇对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，将它移回其拥有者手上。
foreign_names.flavor: 「它如此真实！」

foreign_names.name: 受驚而醒 // 不散夢魘
foreign_names.text:
潛匿（此生物不能被力量比它大的生物阻擋。）
當不散夢魘對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，將它移回其擁有者手上。
foreign_names.flavor: 「它如此真實！」

Stitched Mangler.name: Stitched Mangler
Stitched Mangler.text:
Stitched Mangler enters the battlefield tapped.
When Stitched Mangler enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Stitched Mangler.original_text:
Stitched Mangler enters the battlefield tapped.
When Stitched Mangler enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

foreign_names.name: Zusammengeflickter Verstümmler
foreign_names.text:
Der Zusammengeflickte Verstümmler kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Wenn der Zusammengeflickte Verstümmler ins Spiel kommt, tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. Diese Kreatur enttappt nicht während des nächsten Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.

foreign_names.name: Mutilador suturado
foreign_names.text:
El Mutilador suturado entra al campo de batalla girado.
Cuando el Mutilador suturado entre al campo de batalla, gira la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente. Esa criatura no se endereza durante el próximo paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreign_names.name: Déchiqueteur suturé
foreign_names.text:
Le Déchiqueteur suturé arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Quand le Déchiqueteur suturé arrive sur le champ de bataille, engagez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle. Cette créature ne se dégage pas pendant la prochaine étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.

foreign_names.name: Stritolatore Ricucito
foreign_names.text:
Lo Stritolatore Ricucito entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
Quando lo Stritolatore Ricucito entra nel campo di battaglia, TAPpa una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario. Quella creatura non STAPpa durante il prossimo STAP del suo controllore.

foreign_names.name: 縫合の刻み獣
foreign_names.text:
縫合の刻み獣はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
縫合の刻み獣が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。そのクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ・ホラー

foreign_names.name: 봉합된 훼손자
foreign_names.text:
봉합된 훼손자는 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
봉합된 훼손자가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 탭한다. 그 생물은 조종자의 다음 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.

foreign_names.name: Desmembrador Suturado
foreign_names.text:
Desmembrador Suturado entra no campo de batalha virado.
Quando Desmembrador Suturado entrar no campo de batalha, vire a criatura alvo que um oponente controla. Aquela criatura não desvira durante a próxima etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.

foreign_names.name: Сшитый Кромсатель
foreign_names.text:
Сшитый Кромсатель выходит на поле битвы повернутым.
Когда Сшитый Кромсатель выходит на поле битвы, поверните целевое существо под контролем оппонента. То существо не разворачивается во время следующего шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.

foreign_names.name: 缝组破坏者
foreign_names.text:
缝组破坏者须横置进战场。
当缝组破坏者进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的生物。该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

foreign_names.name: 縫組破壞者
foreign_names.text:
縫組破壞者須橫置進戰場。
當縫組破壞者進戰場時，橫置目標由對手操控的生物。該生物於其操控者的下一個重置步驟中不能重置。

Stitchwing Skaab.name: Stitchwing Skaab
Stitchwing Skaab.text:
Flying
{1}{U}, Discard two cards: Return Stitchwing Skaab from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Stitchwing Skaab.flavor:
"Amazing, isn't it, how scraps can come together to create such a wonder?"
—Stitcher Geralf
Stitchwing Skaab.original_text:
Flying
{1}{U}, Discard two cards: Return Stitchwing Skaab from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Stitchwing Skaab’s last ability can only be activated while it’s in your graveyard.

foreign_names.name: Nahtschwingen-Skaab
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
{1}{U}, wirf zwei Karten ab: Bringe den Nahtschwingen-Skaab aus deinem Friedhof getappt ins Spiel zurück.
foreign_names.flavor: „Grenzt es nicht an ein Wunder, wie sich Reste zu so etwas zusammenfügen lassen?" —Geralf der Leichenflicker

foreign_names.name: Skaab alacosida
foreign_names.text:
Vuela.
{1}{U}, descartar dos cartas: Regresa el Skaab alacosida de tu cementerio al campo de batalla girado.
foreign_names.flavor: "¿No es increíble cómo un puñado de sobras pueden formar tal maravilla?" —Suturador Geralf

foreign_names.name: Skaab aux ailes suturées
foreign_names.text:
Vol
{1}{U}, défaussez-vous de deux cartes : Renvoyez sur le champ de bataille, engagé, le Skaab aux ailes suturées depuis votre cimetière.
foreign_names.flavor: « Fascinant, n'est-ce pas, la façon dont des restes peuvent être assemblés pour créer une telle merveille ? » —Raccommodeur Geralf

foreign_names.name: Skaab Alacucita
foreign_names.text:
Volare
{1}{U}, Scarta due carte: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia lo Skaab Alacucita TAPpato dal tuo cimitero.
foreign_names.flavor: "Non è incredibile come, unendo dei resti, si possa creare una tale meraviglia?" —Cucitore Geralf

foreign_names.name: 縫い翼のスカーブ
foreign_names.text:
飛行
{1}{U}, カード２枚を捨てる：あなたの墓地から縫い翼のスカーブをタップ状態で戦場に戻す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ・ホラー
foreign_names.flavor: 「素晴らしいではないか。ゴミを集めて、これほどの驚異を作り出せるとは。」 ――縫い師、ゲラルフ

foreign_names.name: 봉합날개 스캅
foreign_names.text:
비행
{1}{U}, 카드 두 장을 버린다: 봉합날개 스캅을 당신의 무덤에서 탭된 채로 전장으로 되돌린다.
foreign_names.flavor: "스캅으로 저런 걸작을 만들었다는 게 정말 놀랍지 않소?" —봉합술사 게랄프

foreign_names.name: Skaab da Asa Suturada
foreign_names.text:
Voar
{1}{U}, Descarte dois cards: Devolva Skaab da Asa Suturada de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha virado.
foreign_names.flavor: "É impressionante como de um monte de retalhos pode ser criada tamanha maravilha." — Suturador Geralf

foreign_names.name: Скааб Сшитых Крыльев
foreign_names.text:
Полет
{1}{U}, сбросьте две карты: верните Скааба Сшитых Крыльев из вашего кладбища на поле битвы повернутым.
foreign_names.flavor: «Удивительно, не правда ли? Из разрозненных лоскутов получается такое чудо...» — сшиватель Геральф

foreign_names.name: 缝翼尸嵌
foreign_names.text:
飞行
{1}{U}，弃两张牌：将缝翼尸嵌从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。
foreign_names.flavor: 「多神奇啊，废品竟能拼出如此奇物！」 ～拼接师基拉夫

foreign_names.name: 縫翼屍嵌
foreign_names.text:
飛行
{1}{U}，棄兩張牌：將縫翼屍嵌從你的墳墓場橫置移回戰場。
foreign_names.flavor: 「多神奇啊，廢品竟能拼出如此奇物！」 ～拼接師基拉夫

Stormrider Spirit.name: Stormrider Spirit
Stormrider Spirit.flavor: Thunder isn't all that follows lightning.
Stormrider Spirit.original_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying

foreign_names.name: Sturmreiter-Geist
foreign_names.text:
Aufblitzen (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch zu jedem Zeitpunkt wirken, zu dem du einen Spontanzauber wirken könntest.)
Fliegend
foreign_names.flavor: Donner ist nicht das Einzige, was auf einen Blitz folgt.

foreign_names.name: Espíritu surcatormentas
foreign_names.text:
Destello. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo en cualquier momento en que pudieras lanzar un instantáneo.)
Vuela.
foreign_names.flavor: El trueno no es lo único que sucede al relámpago.

foreign_names.name: Esprit de chevaucheur de tempête
foreign_names.text:
Flash (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort à tout moment où vous pourriez lancer un éphémère.)
Vol
foreign_names.flavor: Les éclairs n'annoncent pas que le tonnerre.

foreign_names.name: Spirito Cavalcatempeste
foreign_names.text:
Lampo (Puoi lanciare questa magia in ogni momento in cui potresti lanciare un istantaneo.)
Volare
foreign_names.flavor: Il tuono non è il solo a seguire i fulmini.

foreign_names.name: 嵐乗りの精霊
foreign_names.text:
瞬速（あなたはこの呪文を、あなたがインスタントを唱えられるときならいつでも唱えてよい。）
飛行
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — スピリット
foreign_names.flavor: 稲妻に続くのは雷鳴だけではない。

foreign_names.name: 폭풍기수 정령
foreign_names.text:
섬광 (순간마법을 발동할 수 있는 시기라면 당신은 이 주문을 언제든지 발동할 수 있다.)
비행
foreign_names.flavor: 벼락 뒤에는 천둥만 따라오는 게 아니다.

foreign_names.name: Espírito Ginete de Tempestade
foreign_names.text:
Lampejo (Você poderá conjurar esta mágica a qualquer momento em que puder conjurar uma mágica instantânea.)
Voar
foreign_names.flavor: O trovão não é tudo que vem depois do relâmpago.

foreign_names.name: Дух Всадника Бури
foreign_names.text:
Миг (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание при любой возможности разыгрывать мгновенные заклинания.)
Полет
foreign_names.flavor: Гром не всегда следует за молнией.

foreign_names.name: 驭霆精怪
foreign_names.text:
闪现（你可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放此咒语。）
飞行
foreign_names.flavor: 闪电过后并不只有雷声相随。

foreign_names.name: 馭霆精靈
foreign_names.text:
閃現（你可以於你能夠施放瞬間的時機下施放此咒語。）
飛行
foreign_names.flavor: 閃電過後並不只有雷聲相隨。

Thing in the Ice // Awoken Horror.name: Thing in the Ice // Awoken Horror
Thing in the Ice // Awoken Horror.text: When this creature transforms into Awoken Horror, return all non-Horror creatures to their owners' hands.
Thing in the Ice // Awoken Horror.flavor:
"It serves as evidence of the ancient power of the deep, a reminder that the sea is the only thing worthy of reverence."
—Runo Stromkirk
Thing in the Ice // Awoken Horror.original_text: When this creature transforms into Awoken Horror, return all non-Horror creatures to their owners' hands.

rulings.text: When Thing in the Ice’s triggered ability removes the last counter from it, Awoken Horror’s ability will trigger and resolve before the spell that caused Thing in the Ice’s last ability to trigger.
Removing all ice counters from Thing in the Ice some other way will not cause it to transform. You’ll need to cast an instant or sorcery spell and cause its last ability to trigger.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

foreign_names.name: Das Ding im Eis // Erweckter Schrecken
foreign_names.text: Wenn diese Kreatur in den Erweckten Schrecken transformiert, bringe alle Nicht-Schrecken-Kreaturen auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Er zeugt von der uralten Macht der Tiefe. Er erinnert uns daran, dass nur das Meer unserer Ehrfurcht würdig ist."
—Runo Stromkirch

foreign_names.name: Entidad congelada // Horror despertado
foreign_names.text: Cuando esta criatura se transforma en el Horror despertado, regresa todas las criaturas que no sean Horror a las manos de sus propietarios.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Sirve de evidencia del antiguo poder de las profundidades; un recordatorio de que el mar es lo único que merece ser venerado."
—Runo Stromkirk

foreign_names.name: Spécimen pris dans la glace // Horreur éveillée

foreign_names.flavor:
« Elle prouve la puissance ancestrale des profondeurs, et nous rappelle que la mer est la seule chose qui mérite d'être vénérée. »
—Runo Stromkirk

foreign_names.name: Cosa nel Ghiaccio // Orrore Risvegliato

foreign_names.flavor:
"Costituisce la prova dell'antico potere degli abissi, rammentandoci che solo il mare è degno di venerazione."
—Runo Stromkirk

foreign_names.name: 氷の中の存在 // 目覚めた恐怖

foreign_names.flavor:
「これは深海の古えの力の顕現であろう。海のみが崇拝に価すると言いたいのだ。」
――流城のルノ

foreign_names.name: 얼음 속 괴수 // 깨어난 공포

foreign_names.flavor:

—루노 스트롬커크

foreign_names.name: 冰封巨物 // 觉醒惧兽

foreign_names.name: 冰封巨物 // 覺醒懼獸

Trail of Evidence.name: Trail of Evidence
Trail of Evidence.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Trail of Evidence.flavor:
"Every answer seems to lead to a more terrifying question."
—Jace Beleren
Trail of Evidence.original_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, investigate. (Put a colorless Clue artifact token onto the battlefield with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

rulings.text: The token is named Clue and has the artifact subtype Clue. Clue isn’t a creature type.
The tokens are normal artifacts. For example, they can be sacrificed to cast Angelic Purge or targeted by Root Out.
If you sacrifice a Clue for another card’s cost or effect, such as that of Angelic Purge or Tamiyo’s Journal, you can’t also pay {2} and sacrifice it to draw a card.

foreign_names.name: Spur von Hinweisen
foreign_names.text: Immer wenn du einen Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei wirkst, stelle Nachforschungen an. (Bringe einen farblosen Hinweis-Artefaktspielstein mit „{2}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Ziehe eine Karte" ins Spiel.)
foreign_names.flavor: „Jede Antwort scheint zu einer weiteren, noch furchterregenderen Frage zu führen." —Jace Beleren

foreign_names.name: Rastro de pruebas
foreign_names.text: Siempre que lances un hechizo de instantáneo o de conjuro, investiga. (Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de artefacto Pista incolora con "{2}, sacrificar este artefacto: Roba una carta".)
foreign_names.flavor: "Cada respuesta parece conducir a una pregunta aún más aterradora". —Jace Beleren

foreign_names.name: Piste de preuves
foreign_names.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort d'éphémère ou de rituel, enquêtez. (Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton d'artefact incolore Indice avec « {2}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Piochez une carte. »)
foreign_names.flavor: « Chaque réponse semble poser une question plus terrifiante encore. » —Jace Beleren

foreign_names.name: Pista di Indizi

foreign_names.flavor: "Ogni risposta sembra condurre a una domanda ancor più terrificante." —Jace Beleren

foreign_names.name: 証拠の痕跡
foreign_names.text: あなたがインスタント・呪文かソーサリー・呪文を１つ唱えるたび、調査を行う。（「{2}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：カードを１枚引く。」を持つ無色の手掛かり・アーティファクト・トークンを１つ戦場に出す。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「どの答えも、一層恐ろしい問いに繋がっているようだ。」 ――ジェイス・ベレレン

foreign_names.name: 단서의 흔적

foreign_names.name: Trilha de Indícios

foreign_names.flavor: "Toda resposta parece levar a uma pergunta ainda mais aterradora." — Jace Beleren

foreign_names.name: Тропа Доказательств

foreign_names.name: 证据线索

foreign_names.flavor: 「似乎所有答案都是另一個更可怕問題的開端。」 ～傑斯貝連

rulings.text: Skulk matters only as blockers are chosen. Modifying either creature’s power after blockers are chosen won’t cause the attacking creature to become unblocked.

If you cause a creature to have 0 power or less, use the actual value (which may be negative) to determine whether it can block or be blocked. A creature with skulk and 0 or less power most likely won’t be blocked, but it won’t deal combat damage and won’t trigger any abilities that trigger when combat damage is dealt.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

foreign_names.name: 健忘の器

foreign_names.text: {U}, 기억 착오의 그릇을 희생한다: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 세 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다. 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "날 믿고 모든 걸 기록해." —트레이벤 검사관 발론

foreign_names.text: {U}, Sacrifique Receptáculo da Paramnésia: O jogador alvo coloca os três cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério. Compre um card.

foreign_names.name: Сосуд Ложной Памяти

Welcome to the Fold.name: Welcome to the Fold
Welcome to the Fold.text:
Madness {X}{U}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Gain control of target creature if its toughness is 2 or less. If this spell's madness cost was paid, instead gain control of that creature if its toughness is X or less.
Welcome to the Fold.original_text:
Madness {X}{U}{U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Gain control of target creature if its toughness is 2 or less. If Welcome to the Fold's madness cost was paid, instead gain control of that creature if its toughness is X or less.

rulings.text: The toughness of the creature is checked only as Welcome to the Fold resolves. It doesn’t matter if it has higher toughness as you cast Welcome to the Fold, or if its toughness becomes higher after Welcome to the Fold has resolved.
Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its converted mana cost. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

foreign_names.name: Willkommen im Bund
foreign_names.text:
Wahnsinn {X}{U}{U} (Falls du diese Karte abwirfst, wirf sie ins Exil ab. Wenn du dies tust, wirke sie für ihre Wahnsinn-Kosten oder lege sie auf deinen Friedhof.)
Übernimm die Kontrolle über eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, falls ihre Widerstandskraft 2 oder weniger beträgt. Falls die Wahnsinn-Kosten von Willkommen im Bund bezahlt wurden, übernimm stattdessen die Kontrolle über diese Kreatur, falls ihre Widerstandskraft X oder weniger beträgt.

foreign_names.name: Bienvenida al redil
foreign_names.text:
Demencia {X}{U}{U}. (Si descartas esta carta, exíliala. Cuando lo hagas, lánzala por su coste de demencia o ponla en tu cementerio.)
Ganas el control de la criatura objetivo si su resistencia es 2 o menos. Si se pagó el coste de demencia de Bienvenida al redil, en vez de eso, ganas el control de la criatura objetivo si su resistencia es X o menos.

foreign_names.name: Bienvenue au bercail
foreign_names.text:
Folie {X}{U}{U} (Si vous vous défaussez de cette carte, défaussez-vous en vers l'exil. Quand vous le faites, lancez-la pour son coût de folie ou mettez-la dans votre cimetière.)
Acquérez le contrôle de la créature ciblée si son endurance est inférieure ou égale à 2. Si le coût de folie de Bienvenue au bercail a été payé, à la place acquérez le contrôle de cette créature si son endurance est inférieure ou égale à X.

foreign_names.name: Benvenuto nel Gregge
foreign_names.text:
Follia {X}{U}{U} (Se scarti questa carta, scartala in esilio. Quando lo fai, lanciala pagando il suo costo di follia o mettila nel tuo cimitero.)
Prendi il controllo di una creatura bersaglio se la sua costituzione è pari o inferiore a 2. Se è stato pagato il costo di follia di Benvenuto nel Gregge, invece prendi il controllo di quella creatura se la sua costituzione è pari o inferiore a X.

foreign_names.name: 教団の歓迎
foreign_names.text:
マッドネス{X}{U}{U}（あなたがこのカードを捨てるなら、これを追放領域に捨てる。あなたがそうしたとき、マッドネス・コストでこれを唱えるか、これをあなたの墓地に置く。）
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。そのクリーチャーのタフネスが２以下であるなら、それのコントロールを得る。教団の歓迎のマッドネス・コストが支払われていたなら、代わりに、そのクリーチャーのタフネスがＸ以下であるなら、それのコントロールを得る。

foreign_names.name: 단체 가입
foreign_names.text:
광기 {X}{U}{U} (이 카드를 버리는 경우, 추방 영역에 버린다. 그렇게 할 때, 광기 비용을 지불하고 이 카드를 발동하거나 당신의 무덤에 이 카드를 놓는다.)
생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물의 방어력이 2 이하라면, 그 생물의 조종권을 얻는다. 단체 가입의 광기 비용을 지불했다면, 대신 그 생물의 방어력이 X 이하인 경우 그 생물의 조종권을 얻는다.

foreign_names.name: Bem-vindo ao Rebanho
foreign_names.text:
Loucura {X}{U}{U} (Se você descartar este card, descarte-o para o exílio. Quando fizer isso, conjure-o por seu custo de loucura ou coloque-o em seu cemitério.)
Ganhe o controle da criatura alvo se a resistência dela for igual ou inferior a 2. Se o custo de loucura de Bem-vindo ao Rebanho foi pago, em vez disso, ganhe o controle daquela criatura se a resistência dela for igual ou inferior a X.

foreign_names.name: Прием в Паству
foreign_names.text:
Бешенство {X}{U}{U} (Если вы сбрасываете эту карту, сбросьте ее в изгнание. Когда вы это делаете, разыграйте ее за ее стоимость Бешенства или положите на ваше кладбище.)
Получите контроль над целевым существом, если его выносливость равна 2 или меньше. Если стоимость Бешенства Приема в Паству была оплачена, вместо этого получите контроль над тем существом, если его выносливость равна X или меньше.

foreign_names.name: 受拥入教
foreign_names.text:
疯魔{X}{U}{U}（如果你弃掉此牌，将之弃到放逐区。当你如此作时，支付其疯魔费用施放之，否则便将其置入你的坟墓场。）
如果目标生物的防御力等于或小于2，则获得该生物的操控权。如果曾支付受拥入教的疯魔费用，则改为如果该生物的防御力等于或小于X，则获得其操控权。

Accursed Witch // Infectious Curse.original_text:
Enchant player
Spells you cast that target enchanted player cost {1} less to cast.
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: Accursed Witch’s first ability affects all spells cast by your opponents that target it, including Aura spells and spells that have additional targets. It doesn’t affect abilities.

If an effect causes Accursed Witch to transform on the battlefield, rather than leaving it and returning transformed, then Infectious Curse doesn’t become attached to any player and is put into your graveyard. This won’t cause abilities that trigger when a creature leaves the battlefield to trigger.
Infectious Curse’s middle ability affects all spells you cast that target the enchanted player, including Aura spells and spells that have additional targets. It doesn’t affect abilities.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

Alms of the Vein.name: Alms of the Vein
Alms of the Vein.text:
Target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Alms of the Vein.original_text:
Target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its mana value. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

Asylum Visitor.name: Asylum Visitor
Asylum Visitor.text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Asylum Visitor.flavor: "The ravings of the mad are laced with eldritch knowledge."
Asylum Visitor.original_text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: The upkeep step is before the draw step, after the untap step. Asylum Visitor’s first ability will trigger and resolve before the active player draws a card in their draw step if that player has no cards in hand.

Asylum Visitor’s triggered ability checks the active player’s hand as the upkeep begins and as the trigger resolves. If that player has a card in hand as it resolves, you won’t draw a card or lose 1 life. Notably, if you control multiple Asylum Visitors during your upkeep, whichever one’s first ability resolves first will stop the other’s first ability from having any effect unless you have a way to get the card you drew out of your hand before it resolves.

On an opponent’s turn, triggered abilities you control will resolve before any triggered abilities of permanents that opponent controls if they trigger at the same time. This means that if you and your opponent each control an Asylum Visitor during your opponent’s upkeep, and they have no cards in hand, you’ll always draw a card before your opponent has a card in their hand.
Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its mana value. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

Behind the Scenes.name: Behind the Scenes
Behind the Scenes.text:
Creatures you control have skulk. (They can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
{4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Behind the Scenes.flavor: It does no good to bar the gate when the enemy is already inside.
Behind the Scenes.original_text:
Creatures you control have skulk. (They can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
{4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Skulk matters only as blockers are chosen. Modifying either creature’s power after blockers are chosen won’t cause the attacking creature to become unblocked.

If you cause a creature to have 0 power or less, use the actual value (which may be negative) to determine whether it can block or be blocked. A creature with skulk and 0 or less power most likely won’t be blocked, but it won’t deal combat damage and won’t trigger any abilities that trigger when combat damage is dealt.

Biting Rain.name: Biting Rain
Biting Rain.text:
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Biting Rain.flavor: On Innistrad, it is seldom wrong to stay indoors.
Biting Rain.original_text:
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: The set of creatures affected by Biting Rain is determined as the spell resolves. Creatures that enter the battlefield later in the turn won’t get -2/-2.
Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its mana value. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

Creeping Dread.name: Creeping Dread
Creeping Dread.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card. Each opponent who discarded a card that shares a card type with the card you discarded loses 3 life. (Players reveal the discarded cards simultaneously.)
Creeping Dread.original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player discards a card. Each opponent who discarded a card that shares a card type with the card you discarded loses 3 life. (Players reveal the discarded cards simultaneously.)

rulings.text: When a spell or ability instructs each player to discard a card, starting with the player whose turn it is and proceeding in turn order, each player selects a card from their hand without revealing it, sets it aside, and then all of those cards are revealed and discarded at once.

The card types that may be shared for Creeping Dread’s ability are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.

If a player has no cards in hand, that player doesn’t discard a card while everyone else does. If you didn’t discard a card, no player can have discarded a card that shares a card type with the card you discarded, so no player loses 3 life.
If an opponent discards a card that shares two card types with the card you discarded, such as an artifact creature, that player still only loses 3 life.

Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, a double-faced card with different card types among its faces (such as Skin Invasion) only compares its front face to the other discarded cards.

rulings.text: Skulk matters only as blockers are chosen. Modifying either creature’s power after blockers are chosen won’t cause the attacking creature to become unblocked.
