From Under the Floorboards.name: From Under the Floorboards
From Under the Floorboards.text:
Madness {X}{B}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Create three tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens and you gain 3 life. If this spell's madness cost was paid, instead create X of those tokens and you gain X life.
From Under the Floorboards.original_text:
Madness {X}{B}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Put three 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield tapped and you gain 3 life. If From Under the Floorboards's madness cost was paid, instead put X of those tokens onto the battlefield tapped and you gain X life.

rulings.text: Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its converted mana cost. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

foreign_names.name: Von unter den Dielen
foreign_names.text:

Gisa's Bidding.name: Gisa's Bidding
Gisa's Bidding.text:
Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Gisa's Bidding.original_text:
Put two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its converted mana cost. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

Hound of the Farbogs.name: Hound of the Farbogs
Hound of the Farbogs.text: Delirium — Hound of the Farbogs has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Hound of the Farbogs.flavor: As you hear it baying in the distance, you'll feel its breath on your neck.
Hound of the Farbogs.original_text: Delirium — Hound of the Farbogs has menace as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

rulings.text: Menace only matters as blockers are chosen. Causing Hound of the Farbogs to gain menace after blockers are chosen won’t cause it to become unblocked.

The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Kindly Stranger // Demon-Possessed Witch.name: Kindly Stranger // Demon-Possessed Witch
Kindly Stranger // Demon-Possessed Witch.text: When this creature transforms into Demon-Possessed Witch, you may destroy target creature.
Kindly Stranger // Demon-Possessed Witch.flavor: "It looks like you could use some protection of your own."
Kindly Stranger // Demon-Possessed Witch.original_text: When this creature transforms into Demon-Possessed Witch, you may destroy target creature.

rulings.text: The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Activating Kindly Stranger’s ability twice won’t cause it to transform back into Kindly Stranger once it has already transformed into Demon-Possessed Witch.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Some delirium abilities are activated abilities of permanents. To activate such an ability, there must be four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. The number of card types is not rechecked as the ability resolves.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

rulings.text: You must sacrifice exactly one creature or land to cast Merciless Resolve. You can’t cast it without sacrificing a permanent, and you can’t sacrifice additional permanents.

Players can respond to this spell only after it’s been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature or land you sacrificed to stop you from casting this spell or to make you sacrifice a different one.

Mindwrack Demon.name: Mindwrack Demon
Mindwrack Demon.text:
Flying, trample
When Mindwrack Demon enters the battlefield, mill four cards.
Delirium — At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 4 life unless there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Mindwrack Demon.original_text:
Flying, trample
When Mindwrack Demon enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.
Delirium — At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 4 life unless there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Mindwrack Demon’s delirium triggered ability does not include an intervening “if” clause. This ability triggers at the beginning of your upkeep regardless of the number of types in your graveyard, and it checks that number as it resolves to determine whether you lose 4 life or not.

The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Morkrut Necropod.name: Morkrut Necropod
Morkrut Necropod.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever Morkrut Necropod attacks or blocks, sacrifice another creature or land.
Morkrut Necropod.flavor:
"There's not enough salt in all of Nephalia to wither that thing."
—Ghoulcaller Enslow
Morkrut Necropod.original_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever Morkrut Necropod attacks or blocks, sacrifice another creature or land.

rulings.text: When Morkrut Necropod attacks, its trigger doesn’t resolve until after all attackers have been chosen. The same is true for when it blocks. This means that another creature, such as one enchanted with Invocation of Saint Traft, can also attack or block and then be sacrificed. Sacrificing a blocking creature this way doesn’t cause the creature it blocked to become unblocked.
In the unusual situation that you control no other creatures or lands, the last ability won’t do anything. Morkrut Necropod can attack or block with no penalty.

每当穆坎尸足虫进行攻击或阻挡时，牺牲另一个生物或地。
foreign_names.flavor: 「涅非利亚全部的盐加起来都不足以化掉那个东西。」 ～尸鬼牧者恩斯洛

foreign_names.name: 穆坎屍足蟲
foreign_names.text:
威懾（此生物只能被兩個或更多生物阻擋。）
每當穆坎屍足蟲進行攻擊或阻擋時，犧牲另一個生物或地。
foreign_names.flavor: 「涅非利亞全部的鹽加起來都不足以化掉那個東西。」 ～屍鬼牧者恩斯洛

Murderous Compulsion.name: Murderous Compulsion
Murderous Compulsion.text:
Destroy target tapped creature.
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Murderous Compulsion.flavor: "Thank you. This blade becomes so hot in my hand, but your blood has quenched it."
Murderous Compulsion.original_text:
Destroy target tapped creature.
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its converted mana cost. You just pay the madness cost instead.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

foreign_names.name: Mörderischer Drang
foreign_names.text:
Zerstöre eine getappte Kreatur deiner Wahl.
Wahnsinn {1}{B} (Falls du diese Karte abwirfst, wirf sie ins Exil ab. Wenn du dies tust, wirke sie für ihre Wahnsinn-Kosten oder lege sie auf deinen Friedhof.)
foreign_names.flavor: „Danke! Die Klinge wurde so heiß in meiner Hand, doch dein Blut hat ihren Durst gelöscht."

foreign_names.name: Pulsión asesina
foreign_names.text:
Destruye la criatura objetivo girada.
Demencia {1}{B}. (Si descartas esta carta, exíliala. Cuando lo hagas, lánzala por su coste de demencia o ponla en tu cementerio.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Gracias. Esta navaja arde en mis manos, pero tu sangre la refrescó."

foreign_names.name: Instinct meurtrier
foreign_names.text:
Détruisez la créature engagée ciblée.
Folie {1}{B} (Si vous vous défaussez de cette carte, défaussez-vous en vers l'exil. Quand vous le faites, lancez-la pour son coût de folie ou mettez-la dans votre cimetière.)
foreign_names.flavor: « Merci. Cette lame devenait si chaude dans ma main, mais votre sang lui a fait du bien. »

foreign_names.name: Impulso Omicida
foreign_names.text:
Distruggi una creatura TAPpata bersaglio.
Follia {1}{B} (Se scarti questa carta, scartala in esilio. Quando lo fai, lanciala pagando il suo costo di follia o mettila nel tuo cimitero.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Grazie. Tra le mie mani questa lama si arroventa, ma il tuo sangue l'ha raffreddata."

foreign_names.name: 殺人衝動
foreign_names.text:
タップ状態のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
マッドネス{1}{B}（あなたがこのカードを捨てるなら、これを追放領域に捨てる。あなたがそうしたとき、マッドネス・コストでこれを唱えるか、これをあなたの墓地に置く。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「助かったよ。手に持ったナイフが熱かったんだが、君の血で冷やせたようだ。」

foreign_names.name: 살인 충동
foreign_names.text:
탭된 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
광기 {1}{B} (이 카드를 버리는 경우, 추방 영역에 버린다. 그렇게 할 때, 광기 비용을 지불하고 이 카드를 발동하거나 당신의 무덤에 이 카드를 놓는다.)
foreign_names.flavor: "고맙네. 검이 손에 쥘 수 없을 만큼 뜨거웠는데 네 놈의 피가 식혀주었군."

foreign_names.name: Compulsão Assassina
foreign_names.text:
Destrua a criatura alvo virada.
Loucura {1}{B} (Se você descartar este card, descarte-o para o exílio. Quando fizer isso, conjure-o por seu custo de loucura ou coloque-o em seu cemitério.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Obrigado. Esta lâmina fica tão quente na minha mão... mas o seu sangue a resfriou."

foreign_names.name: Убийственный Порыв
foreign_names.text:
Уничтожьте целевое повернутое существо.
Бешенство {1}{B} (Если вы сбрасываете эту карту, сбросьте ее в изгнание. Когда вы это делаете, разыграйте ее за ее стоимость Бешенства или положите на ваше кладбище.)
foreign_names.flavor: «Спасибо. Клинок жег мне руку, но твоя кровь его охладила».

foreign_names.name: 谋杀冲动
foreign_names.text:
消灭目标已横置的生物。
疯魔{1}{B}（如果你弃掉此牌，将之弃到放逐区。当你如此作时，支付其疯魔费用施放之，否则便将其置入你的坟墓场。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「谢谢你。刚才这把刀在我手中变得十分烫手，是你的鲜血冷却了它。」

foreign_names.name: 謀殺衝動
foreign_names.text:
消滅目標已橫置的生物。
瘋魔{1}{B}（如果你棄掉此牌，將之棄到放逐區。當你如此作時，支付其瘋魔費用施放之，否則便將其置入你的墳墓場。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「謝謝你。剛才這把刀在我手中變得十分燙手，是你的鮮血冷卻了它。」

Olivia's Bloodsworn.name: Olivia's Bloodsworn
Olivia's Bloodsworn.text:
Flying
Olivia's Bloodsworn can't block.
{R}: Target Vampire gains haste until end of turn.
Olivia's Bloodsworn.flavor: "As we muster for war, I have little patience for lethargy or recalcitrance."
Olivia's Bloodsworn.original_text:
Flying
Olivia's Bloodsworn can't block.
{R}: Target Vampire gains haste until end of turn.

foreign_names.name: Olivias Blutlakai
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
Olivias Blutlakai kann nicht blocken.
{R}: Ein Vampir deiner Wahl erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreign_names.flavor: „Wenn wir uns für den Krieg rüsten, dulde ich weder Lethargie noch Aufsässigkeit."

foreign_names.name: Jurasangre de Olivia
foreign_names.text:
Vuela.
El Jurasangre de Olivia no puede bloquear.
{R}: El Vampiro objetivo gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "Nos estamos preparando para la guerra. No tengo demasiada paciencia con la apatía o la terquedad".

foreign_names.name: Sangvasseur d'Olivia
foreign_names.text:
Vol
Le Sangvasseur d'Olivia ne peut pas bloquer.
{R} : Le vampire ciblé acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreign_names.flavor: « Maintenant que nous nous rassemblons pour la guerre, je ne tolèrerai ni faiblesse, ni insubordination. »

foreign_names.name: Sanguefedele di Olivia
foreign_names.text:
Volare
Il Sanguefedele di Olivia non può bloccare.
{R}: Un Vampiro bersaglio ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "È tempo di radunarsi per la guerra, non ho molta pazienza con i letargici o i recalcitranti."

foreign_names.name: オリヴィアの血誓い
foreign_names.text:
飛行
オリヴィアの血誓いではブロックできない。
{R}：吸血鬼１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは速攻を得る。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼・兵士
foreign_names.flavor: 「戦争に来てみれば、無気力や反発を我慢できなくなった。」

foreign_names.name: 올리비아의 혈종자
foreign_names.text:
비행
올리비아의 혈종자는 방어할 수 없다.
{R}: 흡혈귀를 목표로 정한다. 그 흡혈귀는 턴종료까지 신속을 얻는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "전쟁에 참전한 이상 무기력해 하거나 명령을 어긴다면 가만 두지 않겠다."

foreign_names.name: Súdito Venijurado de Olivia
foreign_names.text:
Voar
Súdito Venijurado de Olivia não pode bloquear.
{R}: O Vampiro alvo ganha ímpeto até o final do turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "Quando nos preparamos para a guerra, eu tenho pouca paciência para a letargia e a recalcitrância."

foreign_names.name: Кровный Слуга Оливии
foreign_names.text:
Полет
Кровный Слуга Оливии не может блокировать.
{R}: целевой Вампир получает Ускорение до конца хода.
foreign_names.flavor: «Мы готовимся к войне, и я не потерплю ни вялости, ни упрямства».

foreign_names.name: 奥莉薇亚的血誓者
foreign_names.text:
飞行
奥莉薇亚的血誓者不能进行阻挡。
{R}：目标吸血鬼获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。
foreign_names.flavor: 「召军备战时，我不能容忍一丝一毫的懒散与抗命。」

foreign_names.name: 奧莉薇亞的血誓者
foreign_names.text:
飛行
奧莉薇亞的血誓者不能進行阻擋。
{R}：目標吸血鬼獲得敏捷異能直到回合結束。
foreign_names.flavor: 「召軍備戰時，我不能容忍一絲一毫的懶散與抗命。」

Pale Rider of Trostad.name: Pale Rider of Trostad
Pale Rider of Trostad.text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
When Pale Rider of Trostad enters the battlefield, discard a card.
Pale Rider of Trostad.flavor:
"What's worse than being alone on the moors at night? Try *not* being alone."
—Nadila Maas, moor chaplain
Pale Rider of Trostad.original_text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
When Pale Rider of Trostad enters the battlefield, discard a card.

rulings.text: You can cast Pale Rider of Trostad even if you have no other cards in your hand. If you have no cards in hand as the last ability resolves, nothing happens.
Skulk matters only as blockers are chosen. Modifying either creature’s power after blockers are chosen won’t cause the attacking creature to become unblocked.

If you cause a creature to have 0 power or less, use the actual value (which may be negative) to determine whether it can block or be blocked. A creature with skulk and 0 or less power most likely won’t be blocked, but it won’t deal combat damage and won’t trigger any abilities that trigger when combat damage is dealt.

foreign_names.name: Fahle Reiterin aus Trostad
foreign_names.text:
Schleichen (Diese Kreatur kann von Kreaturen mit größerer Stärke nicht geblockt werden.)
Wenn die Fahle Reiterin aus Trostad ins Spiel kommt, wirf eine Karte ab.
foreign_names.flavor: „Was ist schlimmer, als nachts alleine im Moor zu sein? Dort nicht alleine zu sein." —Nadila Maas, Kaplanin der Moore

foreign_names.name: Jinete pálida de Trostad
foreign_names.text:
Escurridizo. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada por criaturas con mayor fuerza que ella.)
Cuando la Jinete pálida de Trostad entre al campo de batalla, descarta una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: "¿Qué es peor que estar sola en los páramos de noche? Intenta no estar sola". —Nadila Maas, capellana de los páramos

foreign_names.name: Cavalière pâle de Trostad
foreign_names.text:
Furtivité (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée par des créatures de force supérieure.)
Quand la Cavalière pâle de Trostad arrive sur le champ de bataille, défaussez-vous d'une carte.
foreign_names.flavor: « Qu'y a-t-il de pire qu'être seule dans la lande en pleine nuit ? Ne pas être seule. » —Nadila Maas, aumônière de la lande

foreign_names.name: Cavalcatrice Pallida di Trostad
foreign_names.text:
Furtivo (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata da creature con forza superiore.)
Quando la Cavalcatrice Pallida di Trostad entra nel campo di battaglia, scarta una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: "Cosa c'è di peggio che ritrovarsi da soli nelle brughiere di notte? Scoprire di non essere da soli." —Nadila Maas, cappellana delle brughiere

foreign_names.name: トロスタッドの死騎手
foreign_names.text:
潜伏（このクリーチャーは、これより大きなパワーを持つクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。）
トロスタッドの死騎手が戦場に出たとき、カード１枚を捨てる。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — スピリット
foreign_names.flavor: 「夜の原野で独りになるより悪いことは何かって？独りでなくなってみればわかるわよ。」 ――原野の司祭、ナディラ・マース

foreign_names.name: 트로스타드의 창백한 기수
foreign_names.text:
은폐 (이 생물은 더 높은 공격력을 가진 생물에게 방어될 수 없다.)
트로스타드의 창백한 기수가 전장에 들어올 때, 카드 한 장을 버린다.
foreign_names.flavor: "한밤중 황야에 홀로 있는 것만큼이나 끔찍한 건 없답니다. 혼자 남겨지지 않도록 하십시오." —황야의 사제 나딜라 마스

foreign_names.name: Ginete Pálido de Trostad
foreign_names.text:
Esquivo (Esta criatura não pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com poder superior ao dela.)
Quando Ginete Pálido de Trostad entrar no campo de batalha, descarte um card.
foreign_names.flavor: "O que é pior do que estar sozinho nos charcos à noite? Experimente não estar sozinho." — Nadila Maas, capelã dos charcos

foreign_names.name: Бледная Всадница Тростада
foreign_names.text:
Скрытность (Это существо не может быть заблокировано существами с большей силой.)
Когда Бледная Всадница Тростада выходит на поле битвы, сбросьте карту.
foreign_names.flavor: «Что может быть хуже, чем оказаться ночью одной на болотах? Думаю, быть там не одной». — Надила Маас, капеллан с болот

foreign_names.name: 卓斯塔苍白骑兵
foreign_names.text:
潜匿（此生物不能被力量比它大的生物阻挡。）
当卓斯塔苍白骑兵进战场时，弃一张牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「还有什么比夜晚单人身处湿地更糟？并非单人的时候。」 ～湿地教士娜迪拉玛丝

foreign_names.name: 卓斯塔蒼白騎兵
foreign_names.text:
潛匿（此生物不能被力量比它大的生物阻擋。）
當卓斯塔蒼白騎兵進戰場時，棄一張牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「還有什麼比夜晚單人身處濕地更糟？並非單人的時候。」 ～濕地教士娜迪拉瑪絲

Pick the Brain.name: Pick the Brain
Pick the Brain.text:
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.
Delirium — If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as the exiled card, exile those cards, then that player shuffles.
Pick the Brain.original_text:
Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.
Delirium — If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as the exiled card, exile those cards, then that player shuffles his or her library.

rulings.text: If there is no nonland card to choose, and you have four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, you’ll search that player’s library even though you won’t be able to find any cards. That library will be shuffled.

The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

foreign_names.name: Gedanken zerpflücken
foreign_names.text:
Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Bestimme eine Karte davon, die kein Land ist, und schicke sie ins Exil.
Delirium — Falls dein Friedhof vier oder mehr unterschiedliche Kartentypen enthält, durchsuche den Friedhof, die Hand und die Bibliothek dieses Spielers nach einer beliebigen Anzahl an Karten mit dem gleichen Namen wie die ins Exil geschickte Karte und schicke diese Karten ins Exil; dieser Spieler mischt dann seine Bibliothek.

foreign_names.name: Hurgar en el cerebro
foreign_names.text:
El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Tú eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra y la exilias.
Delirio — Si entre las cartas de tu cementerio hay cuatro o más tipos de cartas, busca en el cementerio, mano y biblioteca de ese jugador cualquier cantidad de cartas con el mismo nombre que la carta exiliada, exilia esas cartas y luego ese jugador baraja su biblioteca.

foreign_names.name: Creuser la cervelle
foreign_names.text:
L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Choisissez-y une carte non-terrain et exilez cette carte.
Délire — S'il y a au moins quatre types de carte parmi les cartes de votre cimetière, cherchez dans le cimetière, la main et la bibliothèque de ce joueur n'importe quel nombre de cartes ayant le même nom que la carte exilée, exilez-les, puis ce joueur mélange sa bibliothèque.

foreign_names.name: Scervellarsi
foreign_names.text:
Un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra da quella mano ed esilia quella carta.
Delirio — Se ci sono quattro o più tipi di carta tra le carte nel tuo cimitero, passa in rassegna il cimitero, la mano e il grimorio di quel giocatore per un qualsiasi numero di carte con lo stesso nome della carta esiliata ed esiliale, poi quel giocatore rimescola il suo grimorio.

foreign_names.name: 知恵の拝借
foreign_names.text:
対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中から土地でないカードを１枚選び、そのカードを追放する。
昂揚 ― あなたの墓地にあるカードにカード・タイプが合計４種類以上含まれるなら、そのプレイヤーの墓地と手札とライブラリーからそのカードと同じ名前を持つカードを望む枚数探し、それらのカードを追放する。その後そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーを切り直す。

foreign_names.name: 뇌 끄집어내기
foreign_names.text:
상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 당신은 그 중에서 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 골라서 추방한다.
섬망 — 당신의 무덤에 네 개 이상의 카드 유형이 있다면, 그 플레이어의 무덤, 손과 서고에서 추방된 카드와 이름이 같은 카드를 원하는 수만큼 찾아서 추방한다. 그러고 나서 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreign_names.name: Colher o Cérebro
foreign_names.text:
O oponente alvo revela a própria mão. Você escolhe um card que não seja terreno da mão dele e exila aquele card.
Delírio — Se houver quatro ou mais tipos de card entre os cards de seu cemitério, procure no cemitério, na mão e no grimório daquele jogador qualquer número de cards com o mesmo nome do card exilado e exile aqueles cards. Depois, aquele jogador embaralha o próprio grimório.

foreign_names.name: Очистка Мозга
foreign_names.text:
Целевой оппонент показывает свою руку. Вы выбираете из нее не являющуюся землей карту и изгоняете ту карту.
Буйство — Если среди карт на вашем кладбище есть не менее четырех типов карт, найдите на кладбище, в руке и в библиотеке того игрока любое количество карт с таким же именем, что у изгнанной карты, и изгоните их, затем тот игрок тасует свою библиотеку.

foreign_names.name: 采摘思绪
foreign_names.text:
目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非地牌，并放逐该牌。
躁狂～如果你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，则从该牌手的坟墓场、手牌及牌库中搜寻任意数量与所放逐之牌同名的牌，放逐这些牌，然后该牌手将其牌库洗牌。

foreign_names.name: 採摘思緒
foreign_names.text:
目標對手展示其手牌。你選擇其中一張非地牌，並放逐該牌。
躁狂～如果你墳墓場中牌的類別有四種或更多，則從該玩家的墳墓場、手牌及牌庫中搜尋任意數量與所放逐之牌同名的牌，放逐這些牌，然後該玩家將其牌庫洗牌。

Rancid Rats.name: Rancid Rats
Rancid Rats.text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Rancid Rats.flavor: "They're in the walls! Can't you hear them?"
Rancid Rats.original_text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

rulings.text: Skulk matters only as blockers are chosen. Modifying either creature’s power after blockers are chosen won’t cause the attacking creature to become unblocked.

If you cause a creature to have 0 power or less, use the actual value (which may be negative) to determine whether it can block or be blocked. A creature with skulk and 0 or less power most likely won’t be blocked, but it won’t deal combat damage and won’t trigger any abilities that trigger when combat damage is dealt.

foreign_names.name: Ranzige Ratten
foreign_names.text:
Schleichen (Diese Kreatur kann von Kreaturen mit größerer Stärke nicht geblockt werden.)
Todesberührung (Eine beliebige Menge Schadenspunkte, die sie einer Kreatur zufügen, sind ausreichend, um diese zu zerstören.)
foreign_names.flavor: „Sie sind in den Wänden! Hörst du sie nicht?"

foreign_names.name: Ratas putrefactas
foreign_names.text:
Escurridizo. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada por criaturas con mayor fuerza que ella.)
Toque mortal. (Cualquier cantidad de daño que esta carta haga a una criatura es suficiente para destruirla.)
foreign_names.flavor: "¡Están en las paredes! ¿No las oyes?"

foreign_names.name: Rats déliquescents
foreign_names.text:
Furtivité (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée par des créatures de force supérieure.)
Contact mortel (Le nombre de blessures que cette créature inflige à une créature, quel qu'il soit, est suffisant pour la détruire.)
foreign_names.flavor: « Ils sont dans les murs ! Vous les entendez ? »

foreign_names.name: Ratti Putrefatti
foreign_names.text:
Furtivo (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata da creature con forza superiore.)
Tocco letale (Qualsiasi danno che questa creatura infligge a una creatura è sufficiente a distruggerla.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Sono nei muri! Non li senti?"

foreign_names.name: 腐臭ネズミ
foreign_names.text:
潜伏（このクリーチャーは、これより大きなパワーを持つクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。）
接死（これが何らかのダメージをクリーチャーに与えたら、それだけで破壊する。）
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ・ネズミ
foreign_names.flavor: 「壁の中にいるんだ！聞こえないのか？」

foreign_names.name: 변질된 쥐
foreign_names.text:
은폐 (이 생물은 더 높은 공격력을 가진 생물에게 방어될 수 없다.)
치명타 (이 생물에게 피해를 입은 생물은 피해의 양에 상관없이 파괴된다.)
foreign_names.flavor: "그 녀석들이 벽 안에 있어! 저 소리가 안 들려?"

foreign_names.name: Ratos Rançosos
foreign_names.text:
Esquivo (Esta criatura não pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com poder superior ao dela.)
Toque mortífero (Qualquer quantidade de dano que esta criatura cause a uma criatura é suficiente para destruí-la.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Eles estão nas paredes! Você não consegue ouvir?"

foreign_names.name: Прогнившие Крысы
foreign_names.text:
Скрытность (Это существо не может быть заблокировано существами с большей силой.)
Смертельное касание (Любое количество повреждений, которое этот объект наносит существу, достаточно, чтобы его уничтожить.)
foreign_names.flavor: «Они в стенах! Ты их слышишь?»

foreign_names.name: 腐臭鼠
foreign_names.text:
潜匿（此生物不能被力量比它大的生物阻挡。）
死触（它对生物造成的任何数量伤害都足以消灭后者。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「墙里都是它们！你难道没听到吗？」

foreign_names.name: 腐臭鼠
foreign_names.text:
潛匿（此生物不能被力量比它大的生物阻擋。）
死觸（它對生物造成的任何數量傷害都足以消滅後者。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「牆裡都是它們！你難道沒聽到嗎？」

Relentless Dead.name: Relentless Dead
Relentless Dead.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Relentless Dead dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, return it to its owner's hand.
When Relentless Dead dies, you may pay {X}. If you do, return another target Zombie creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Relentless Dead.original_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Relentless Dead dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, return it to its owner's hand.
When Relentless Dead dies, you may pay {X}. If you do, return another target Zombie creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield.

rulings.text: Relentless Dead’s last two abilities trigger at the same time and can be put on the stack in either order. The ability put on the stack first will be the last to resolve.
You decide whether to pay for each triggered ability as it resolves. If you do, the rest of that ability’s effect happens before any player may take actions.

foreign_names.name: Unablässiger Toter
foreign_names.text:
Bedrohlich (Diese Kreatur kann nicht geblockt werden, außer von zwei oder mehr Kreaturen.)
Wenn der Unablässige Tote stirbt, kannst du {B} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, bringe ihn auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück.
Wenn der Unablässige Tote stirbt, kannst du {X} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, bringe eine andere Zombie-Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl mit umgewandelten Manakosten von X aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.

foreign_names.name: Muerto implacable
foreign_names.text:
Amenaza. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por dos o más criaturas.)
Cuando el Muerto implacable muera, puedes pagar {B}. Si lo haces, regrésalo a la mano de su propietario.
Cuando el Muerto implacable muera, puedes pagar {X}. Si lo haces, regresa otra carta de criatura Zombie objetivo con coste de maná convertido de X de tu cementerio al campo de batalla.

foreign_names.name: Morts implacables
foreign_names.text:
Menace (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par deux créatures ou plus.)
Quand les Morts implacables meurent, vous pouvez payer {B}. Si vous faites ainsi, renvoyez-les dans la main de leur propriétaire.
Quand les Morts implacables meurent, vous pouvez payer {X}. Si vous faites ainsi, renvoyez sur le champ de bataille, depuis votre cimetière, une autre carte de créature Zombie avec un coût converti de mana de X ciblée.

foreign_names.name: Morto Implacabile
foreign_names.text:
Minacciare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da due o più creature.)
Quando il Morto Implacabile muore, puoi pagare {B}. Se lo fai, fallo tornare in mano al suo proprietario.
Quando il Morto Implacabile muore, puoi pagare {X}. Se lo fai, rimetti sul campo di battaglia un'altra carta creatura Zombie bersaglio con costo di mana convertito pari a X dal tuo cimitero.

foreign_names.name: 無情な死者
foreign_names.text:
威迫（このクリーチャーは２体以上のクリーチャーによってしかブロックされない。）
無情な死者が死亡したとき、あなたは{B}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、これをオーナーの手札に戻す。
無情な死者が死亡したとき、あなたの墓地から点数で見たマナ・コストがＸの他のゾンビ・クリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。あなたは{X}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、それを戦場に戻す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ

foreign_names.name: 집요한 망자
foreign_names.text:
호전적 (이 생물은 두 개 이상의 생물에만 방어될 수 있다.)
집요한 망자가 죽을 때, 당신은 {B}를 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 집요한 망자를 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
집요한 망자가 죽을 때, 당신은 {X}를 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 당신의 무덤에 있는 전환마나비용이 X인 다른 좀비 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreign_names.name: Morto Persistente
foreign_names.text:
Ameaçar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por duas ou mais criaturas.)
Quando Morto Persistente morrer, você pode pagar {B}. Se fizer isso, devolva-o para a mão de seu dono.
Quando Morto Persistente morrer, você pode pagar {X}. Se fizer isso, devolva outro card de criatura alvo do tipo Zumbi com custo de mana convertido igual a X de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha.

foreign_names.name: Упорный Мертвец
foreign_names.text:
Угроза (Это существо не может быть заблокировано менее чем двумя существами.)
Когда Упорный Мертвец умирает, вы можете заплатить {B}. Если вы это делаете, верните его в руку владельца.
Когда Упорный Мертвец умирает, вы можете заплатить {X}. Если вы это делаете, верните другую целевую карту существа-Зомби с конвертированной мана-стоимостью X из вашего кладбища на поле битвы.

foreign_names.name: 无情亡者
foreign_names.text:
威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）
当无情亡者死去时，你可以支付{B}。若你如此作，将它移回其拥有者手上。
当无情亡者死去时，你可以支付{X}。若你如此作，将另一张目标总法术力费用为X的灵俑生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

foreign_names.name: 無情亡者
foreign_names.text:
威懾（此生物只能被兩個或更多生物阻擋。）
當無情亡者死去時，你可以支付{B}。若你如此作，將它移回其擁有者手上。
當無情亡者死去時，你可以支付{X}。若你如此作，將另一張目標總魔法力費用為X的殭屍生物牌從你的墳墓場移回戰場。

Rottenheart Ghoul.name: Rottenheart Ghoul
Rottenheart Ghoul.text: When Rottenheart Ghoul dies, target player discards a card.
Rottenheart Ghoul.flavor:
"To die failing to save a loved one is just so sad—or, more to the point, pathetic."
—Liliana Vess
Rottenheart Ghoul.original_text: When Rottenheart Ghoul dies, target player discards a card.

foreign_names.name: Gammelherz-Ghul
foreign_names.text: Wenn der Gammelherz-Ghul stirbt, wirft ein Spieler deiner Wahl eine Karte ab.
foreign_names.flavor: „Bei dem Versuch, einen geliebten Menschen zu retten, zu versagen und dabei zu sterben ist einfach traurig — oder besser gesagt: einfach erbärmlich." —Liliana Vess

foreign_names.name: Necrófaga corazón pútrido
foreign_names.text: Cuando la Necrófaga corazón pútrido muera, el jugador objetivo descarta una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: "Morir sin haber sido capaz de proteger a un ser querido es tan triste... o, más concretamente, patético". —Liliana Vess

foreign_names.name: Goule au cœur putride
foreign_names.text: Quand la Goule au cœur putride meurt, le joueur ciblé se défausse d'une carte.
foreign_names.flavor: « Mourir en manquant de sauver un être aimé est bien triste... ou, plus exactement, pathétique. » —Liliana Vess

foreign_names.name: Ghoul dal Cuore Putrido
foreign_names.text: Quando la Ghoul dal Cuore Putrido muore, un giocatore bersaglio scarta una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: "Morire nel vano tentativo di salvare una persona amata è davvero triste. Più che altro, patetico." —Liliana Vess

foreign_names.name: 腐敗心のグール
foreign_names.text: 腐敗心のグールが死亡したとき、プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカード１枚を捨てる。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ
foreign_names.flavor: 「愛しい者を救えずに死ぬなんて悲しいわね。というより、哀れかしら。」 ――リリアナ・ヴェス

foreign_names.name: 썩은 심장의 악귀
foreign_names.text: 썩은 심장의 악귀가 죽을 때, 플레이어를 목표로 한다. 그 플레이어는 카드 한 장을 버린다.
foreign_names.flavor: "사랑하는 이를 구하지 못하고 죽는 건 너무나 불쌍해. 아니, 한심하다는 표현이 더 맞겠지." —릴리아나 베스

foreign_names.name: Carniçal do Coração Pútrido
foreign_names.text: Quando Carniçal do Coração Pútrido morre, o jogador alvo descarta um card.
foreign_names.flavor: "Morrer sem conseguir salvar um ente querido é muito triste, ou, mais especificamente, patético." — Liliana Vess

foreign_names.name: Упырь Гнилого Сердца
foreign_names.text: Когда Упырь Гнилого Сердца умирает, целевой игрок сбрасывает карту.
foreign_names.flavor: «Погибнуть, не сумев спасти любимого человека. Очень грустное зрелище... хотя, пожалуй, слово «жалкое» здесь больше подходит». — Лилиана Весс

foreign_names.name: 腐心食尸鬼
foreign_names.text: 当腐心食尸鬼死去时，目标牌手弃一张牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「未能拯救所爱之人而死去着实伤感～或者，更确切地说，着实可悲。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

foreign_names.name: 腐心食屍鬼
foreign_names.text: 當腐心食屍鬼死去時，目標玩家棄一張牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「未能拯救所愛之人而死去著實傷感～或者，更確切地說，著實可悲。」 ～莉蓮娜維斯

Sanitarium Skeleton.name: Sanitarium Skeleton
Sanitarium Skeleton.text: {2}{B}: Return Sanitarium Skeleton from your graveyard to your hand.
Sanitarium Skeleton.flavor: His mind was lost long before his flesh.
Sanitarium Skeleton.original_text: {2}{B}: Return Sanitarium Skeleton from your graveyard to your hand.

foreign_names.name: Skelett aus dem Sanatorium
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: Bringe das Skelett aus dem Sanatorium aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
foreign_names.flavor: Er verlor seinen Verstand, lange bevor er Fleisch und Blut verlor.

foreign_names.name: Esqueleto del sanatorio
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: Regresa el Esqueleto del sanatorio de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreign_names.flavor: Perdió su mente mucho antes que su carne.

foreign_names.name: Squelette interné
foreign_names.text: {2}{B} : Renvoyez le Squelette interné depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreign_names.flavor: Il avait perdu l'esprit bien avant de rendre l'âme.

foreign_names.name: Scheletro del Manicomio
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: Riprendi in mano lo Scheletro del Manicomio dal tuo cimitero.
foreign_names.flavor: La sua mente lo abbandonò molto prima della sua carne.

foreign_names.name: 療養所の骸骨
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}：あなたの墓地から療養所の骸骨をあなたの手札に戻す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — スケルトン
foreign_names.flavor: 肉体より先に精神が滅びた。

foreign_names.name: 요양소 해골
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: 요양소 해골을 당신의 무덤에서 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreign_names.flavor: 그는 육신을 잃기 훨씬 전에 이성을 잃었다.

foreign_names.name: Esqueleto do Sanatório
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: Devolva Esqueleto do Sanatório de seu cemitério para sua mão.
foreign_names.flavor: Sua mente já estava perdida muito antes da carne.

foreign_names.name: Скелет из Лечебницы
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: верните Скелет из Лечебницы из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreign_names.flavor: Он лишился разума задолго до того, как лишился плоти.

foreign_names.name: 疯人院骷髅妖
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}：将疯人院骷髅妖从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreign_names.flavor: 他尸首发臭之前早已发疯。

foreign_names.name: 瘋人院骷髏妖
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}：將瘋人院骷髏妖從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
foreign_names.flavor: 他屍首發臭之前早已發瘋。

Shamble Back.name: Shamble Back
Shamble Back.text: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. You gain 2 life.
Shamble Back.flavor: Lost loved ones are never truly gone.
Shamble Back.original_text: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield. You gain 2 life.

rulings.text: If the creature card becomes an illegal target, Shamble Back doesn’t resolve. None of its effects happen.

foreign_names.name: Zurückschlurfen
foreign_names.text: Schicke eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof ins Exil. Bringe einen 2/2 schwarzen Zombie-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel. Du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreign_names.flavor: Verblichene Angehörige gehen niemals wirklich fort.

foreign_names.name: Arrastrarse de vuelta
foreign_names.text: Exilia la carta de criatura objetivo de un cementerio. Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Zombie negra 2/2. Ganas 2 vidas.
foreign_names.flavor: Los seres queridos que se fueron jamás te dejan del todo.

foreign_names.name: Retour titubant
foreign_names.text: Exilez une carte de créature ciblée d'un cimetière. Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 2/2 noire Zombie. Vous gagnez 2 points de vie.
foreign_names.flavor: Les êtres aimés ne disparaissent jamais vraiment.

foreign_names.name: Ritorno Barcollante
foreign_names.text: Esilia una carta creatura bersaglio da un cimitero. Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Zombie 2/2 nera. Guadagni 2 punti vita.
foreign_names.flavor: I cari che perdiamo non ci lasciano mai del tutto.

foreign_names.name: よろめく帰還
foreign_names.text: 墓地からクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それを追放する。黒の２/２のゾンビ・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。あなたは２点のライフを得る。
foreign_names.flavor: 愛された者は死してもなお消え去らない。

foreign_names.name: 살육장
foreign_names.text: 무덤에 있는 생물 카드 한 장을 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 추방한다. 2/2 흑색 좀비 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다. 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 사랑하는 사람은 죽었어도 영원히 헤어진 것은 아니다.

foreign_names.name: Capengar de Volta
foreign_names.text: Exile o card de criatura alvo de um cemitério. Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura preta 2/2 do tipo Zumbi. Você ganha 2 pontos de vida.
foreign_names.flavor: Os entes queridos perdidos jamais se perdem de verdade.

foreign_names.name: Шаркающее Возвращение
foreign_names.text: Изгоните целевую карту существа из кладбища. Положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 2/2 черный Зомби. Вы получаете 2 жизни.
foreign_names.flavor: Потерянная любовь никогда не уходит навсегда.

foreign_names.name: 蹒跚而回
foreign_names.text: 将目标生物牌从坟墓场放逐。将一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物放进战场。你获得2点生命。
foreign_names.flavor: 逝去的爱人不会真正离去。

foreign_names.name: 蹣跚而回
foreign_names.text: 將目標生物牌從墳墓場放逐。將一個2/2黑色殭屍衍生生物放進戰場。你獲得2點生命。
foreign_names.flavor: 逝去的愛人不會真正離去。

Sinister Concoction.name: Sinister Concoction
Sinister Concoction.text: {B}, Pay 1 life, Mill a card, Discard a card, Sacrifice Sinister Concoction: Destroy target creature.
Sinister Concoction.flavor: An old family recipe for an old family grudge.
Sinister Concoction.original_text: {B}, Pay 1 life, Put the top card of your library into your graveyard, Discard a card, Sacrifice Sinister Concoction: Destroy target creature.

rulings.text: You may pay Sinister Concoction’s costs in any order. However, once you’ve decided to activate the ability and you’ve seen the top card of your library, you can’t change your mind.

foreign_names.name: Übles Gebräu
foreign_names.text: {B}, bezahle 1 Lebenspunkt, lege die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof, wirf eine Karte ab, opfere das Üble Gebräu: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreign_names.flavor: Ein altes Familienrezept für einen alten Familienfluch.

foreign_names.name: Brebaje siniestro
foreign_names.text: {B}, pagar 1 vida, poner la primera carta de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio, descartar una carta, sacrificar el Brebaje siniestro: Destruye la criatura objetivo.

Stallion of Ashmouth.name: Stallion of Ashmouth
Stallion of Ashmouth.text: Delirium — {1}{B}: Stallion of Ashmouth gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Stallion of Ashmouth.flavor: Echoing hoofbeats can no longer be assumed to be help from the Gavony Riders.
Stallion of Ashmouth.original_text: Delirium — {1}{B}: Stallion of Ashmouth gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Some delirium abilities are activated abilities of permanents. To activate such an ability, there must be four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. The number of card types is not rechecked as the ability resolves.

To the Slaughter.name: To the Slaughter
To the Slaughter.text:
Target player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
Delirium — If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, instead that player sacrifices a creature and a planeswalker.
To the Slaughter.flavor:
"Where has little Gossamer gone?"
—Thaniel, Gatstaf shepherd
To the Slaughter.original_text:
Target player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
Delirium — If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, instead that player sacrifices a creature and a planeswalker.

rulings.text: If the delirium ability applies, that player must sacrifice a creature object and a planeswalker object if able. In the unusual case that the player controls a single permanent that’s both a creature and a planeswalker, that player must sacrifice another creature or planeswalker (unless they control no other creatures and no other planeswalkers).

The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Some delirium abilities that appear on instants and sorceries use the word “instead.” These spells have an upgraded effect when they resolve if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. They check that number only while they’re resolving and don’t count themselves, since they aren’t in your graveyard yet. You only get the upgraded effect, not both effects.

Tooth Collector.name: Tooth Collector
Tooth Collector.text:
When Tooth Collector enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, target creature that player controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Tooth Collector.original_text:
When Tooth Collector enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, target creature that player controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Most triggered delirium abilities use an intervening “if” clause. There must be four or more card types among cards in your graveyard in order for these abilities to trigger, otherwise they never trigger at all. There’s no way to have the ability trigger if there aren’t enough card types, even if you intend to raise that number in response to the triggered ability. The number of card types is checked again as the trigger resolves, and if it has become too low somehow, the ability does nothing. If which card types are in your graveyard changes but the quantity of card types stays the same (or increases), then the delirium triggered ability will still resolve.

Triskaidekaphobia.name: Triskaidekaphobia
Triskaidekaphobia.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one —
• Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player gains 1 life.
• Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player loses 1 life.
Triskaidekaphobia.original_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one —
• Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player gains 1 life.
• Each player with exactly 13 life loses the game, then each player loses 1 life.

rulings.text: You can choose a mode even if no player will lose the game. Players will still gain or lose life as appropriate.
If you choose Triskaidekaphobia’s second mode and begin to resolve it while an opponent’s life total is 13 and your life total is 1, that opponent will lose the game before you lose 1 life.
If each player has 13 life as Triskaidekaphobia’s ability resolves, the game ends in a draw.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, each team with 13 life loses the game, then each player on each team gains or loses 1 life, causing the team’s life total to go up or down by 2.

Twins of Maurer Estate.name: Twins of Maurer Estate
Twins of Maurer Estate.text: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Twins of Maurer Estate.flavor:
"Children, where are your parents?"
—Reig, wandering monk, last words
Twins of Maurer Estate.original_text: Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its converted mana cost. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

Bloodmad Vampire.name: Bloodmad Vampire
Bloodmad Vampire.text:
Whenever Bloodmad Vampire deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Bloodmad Vampire.original_text:
Whenever Bloodmad Vampire deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its mana value. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

rulings.text: The abilities that transform a Werewolf back and forth look at the entire previous turn, even if the Werewolf with that ability wasn’t on the battlefield for some or all of that turn.

To trigger the Werewolf’s back face’s transform ability, a single player must have cast two or more spells during the previous turn. If multiple players each cast just one spell during the previous turn, the ability won’t trigger.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

Burn from Within.name: Burn from Within
Burn from Within.text: Burn from Within deals X damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it loses indestructible until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
Burn from Within.original_text: Burn from Within deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it loses indestructible until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: The damaged creature will be exiled if it would die for any reason that turn, not just if it dies due to damage from Burn from Within.

If Burn from Within doesn’t deal damage to the target creature (perhaps because that damage was prevented or X is 0), neither additional effect will apply. It won’t lose indestructible, and it won’t be exiled instead of dying that turn.
You can target a creature that doesn’t have indestructible with Burn from Within. It will still be exiled if it would die this turn.

foreign_names.text: Queimar de Dentro causa X pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo. Se uma criatura sofre dano dessa forma, ela perde indestrutível até o final do turno. Se aquela criatura for morrer neste turno, em vez disso, exile-a.

foreign_names.name: Выгорание
foreign_names.text: Выгорание наносит X повреждений целевому существу или игроку. Если существу наносятся повреждения таким образом, оно теряет Неразрушимость до конца хода. Если то существо должно умереть в этом ходу, изгоните его вместо этого.

foreign_names.name: 内火自燃
foreign_names.text: 内火自燃对目标生物或牌手造成X点伤害。如果某生物以此法受到伤害，则它失去不灭异能直到回合结束。如果本回合中该生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。

foreign_names.name: 內火自燃
foreign_names.text: 內火自燃對目標生物或玩家造成X點傷害。如果某生物以此法受到傷害，則它失去不滅異能直到回合結束。如果本回合中該生物將死去，則改為將它放逐。

Convicted Killer // Branded Howler.name: Convicted Killer // Branded Howler
Convicted Killer // Branded Howler.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Branded Howler.
Convicted Killer // Branded Howler.flavor: It is said that one of the most notorious werewolf howlpacks, the Vildin, only calls those whose hands are already stained with blood.
Convicted Killer // Branded Howler.original_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Branded Howler.

rulings.text: The abilities that transform a Werewolf back and forth look at the entire previous turn, even if the Werewolf with that ability wasn’t on the battlefield for some or all of that turn.

To trigger the Werewolf’s back face’s transform ability, a single player must have cast two or more spells during the previous turn. If multiple players each cast just one spell during the previous turn, the ability won’t trigger.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

foreign_names.name: Verurteilter Mörder // Gebrandmarkter Heuler
foreign_names.text: Zu Beginn jedes Versorgungssegments und falls ein Spieler im letzten Zug zwei oder mehr Zaubersprüche gewirkt hat, transformiere den Gebrandmarkten Heuler.
foreign_names.flavor: Man erzählt sich, dass das Vildin-Rudel, das berüchtigtste Heulerrudel, nur jene aufnimmt, an deren Händen bereits Blut klebt.

foreign_names.name: Asesino convicto // Aullador marcado
foreign_names.text: Al comienzo de cada mantenimiento, si un jugador lanzó dos o más hechizos en el último turno, transforma al Aullador marcado.
foreign_names.flavor: Se dice que una de las jaurías aullantes más importantes, los Vildin, solo llama a aquellos cuyas manos ya están manchadas de sangre.

foreign_names.name: Tueur condamné // Hurleur marqué au fer
foreign_names.text: Au début de chaque entretien, si un joueur a lancé au moins deux sorts au tour précédent, transformez le Hurleur marqué au fer.
foreign_names.flavor: On raconte que l'une des plus célèbres meutes de loups-garous, la hurlemeute Vildin, n'intègre que ceux qui ont déjà du sang sur les mains.

foreign_names.name: Assassino Condannato // Ululatore Marchiato
foreign_names.text: All'inizio di ogni mantenimento, se nell'ultimo turno un giocatore ha lanciato due o più magie, trasforma l'Ululatore Marchiato.
foreign_names.flavor: Dicono che l'ulubranco di mannari Vildin, uno tra i più famigerati, richiami solo coloro che si sono già sporcati le mani di sangue.

foreign_names.name: 既決殺人犯 // 焼き印の咆哮者
foreign_names.text: 各アップキープの開始時に、直前のターンにプレイヤー１人が２つ以上の呪文を唱えていた場合、焼き印の咆哮者を変身させる。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー ― - 狼男
foreign_names.flavor: 最も悪評高い狼男の吠え群れであるヴィルディンは、すでに両手を血で濡らした者のみを仲間に迎えるという。

foreign_names.name: 유죄판결을 받은 살인자 // 낙인 찍힌 표효자
foreign_names.text: 각 유지단 시작에, 만약 한 플레이어가 지난 턴에 두 개 이상의 주문을 발동했다면, 낙인 찍힌 포효자를 변신시킨다.
foreign_names.flavor: 악명 높은 늑대인간 표효떼 빌딘은 이미 손이 피로 물든 늑대인간들만을 소집한다.

foreign_names.name: Matador Condenado // Uivador Marcado
foreign_names.text: No início de cada manutenção, se um jogador tiver conjurado duas ou mais mágicas no último turno, transforme Uivador Marcado.
foreign_names.flavor: Dizem que uma das alcateias uivantes mais notórias, os Vildin, só chama aqueles cujas mãos já estão manchadas de sangue.

foreign_names.name: Осужденный Убийца // Клейменый Завыватель
foreign_names.text: В начале каждого шага поддержки, если в предыдущем ходу игрок разыграл не менее двух заклинаний, трансформируйте Клейменого Завывателя.
foreign_names.flavor: Говорят, что в вильдинскую стаю вервольфов, славящуюся своей жестокостью, берут только тех, чьи руки уже запятнаны кровью.

foreign_names.name: 判罪杀手 // 铭印嚎狼
foreign_names.text: 在每个维持开始时，若某牌手上回合施放了两个或更多咒语，转化铭印嚎狼。
foreign_names.flavor: 据说只有双手已沾有鲜血者，才会受狼人最臭名昭著的维汀嚎群召唤。

foreign_names.name: 判罪殺手 // 銘印嚎狼
foreign_names.text: 在每個維持開始時，若某玩家上回合施放了兩個或更多咒語，轉化銘印嚎狼。
foreign_names.flavor: 據說只有雙手已沾有鮮血者，才會受狼人最臭名昭著的維汀嚎群召喚。

Dance with Devils.name: Dance with Devils
Dance with Devils.text: Create two 1/1 red Devil creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
Dance with Devils.flavor: Devils sow chaos and reap panic.
Dance with Devils.original_text: Put two 1/1 red Devil creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

foreign_names.name: Tanz der Teufel
foreign_names.text: Bringe zwei 1/1 rote Teufel-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel. Sie haben „Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, fügt sie einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu."
foreign_names.flavor: „Klaatu Verata Nektu."

foreign_names.name: Baile demoníaco
foreign_names.text: Pon en el campo de batalla dos fichas de criatura Diablo rojas 1/1. Tienen "Cuando esta criatura muera, hace 1 punto de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo".
foreign_names.flavor: Los diablos siembran caos y cosechan pánico.

foreign_names.name: Danse avec les diables
foreign_names.text: Mettez sur le champ de bataille deux jetons de créature 1/1 rouge Diable. Ils ont « Quand cette créature meurt, elle inflige 1 blessure à une cible, créature ou joueur. »
foreign_names.flavor: Les diables sèment le chaos et récoltent la panique.

foreign_names.name: Danza con i Diavoli
foreign_names.text: Metti sul campo di battaglia due pedine creatura Diavolo 1/1 rosse. Hanno "Quando questa creatura muore, infligge 1 danno a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio".
foreign_names.flavor: I diavoli seminano caos e raccolgono panico.

foreign_names.name: 悪魔と踊る
foreign_names.text: 赤の１/１のデビル・クリーチャー・トークンを２体戦場に出す。それらは「このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。このクリーチャーはそれに１点のダメージを与える。」を持つ。
foreign_names.flavor: 悪魔どもは混沌を蒔き、恐慌を収穫する。

foreign_names.name: 악령과 춤을
foreign_names.text: 1/1 적색 악령 생물 토큰 두 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 토큰들은 "이 생물이 죽을 때, 생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 이 생물은 그 목표에게 피해 1점을 입힌다."를 가진다.
foreign_names.flavor: 악령은 혼돈을 뿌리고 공포를 거둔다.

foreign_names.name: Dançar com os Diabos
foreign_names.text: Coloque no campo de batalha duas fichas de criatura vermelhas 1/1 do tipo Diabo. Elas têm "Quando esta criatura morre, ela causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo."
foreign_names.flavor: Os diabos semeiam o caos e colhem o pânico.

foreign_names.name: Пляска с Дьяволами
foreign_names.text: Положите на поле битвы две фишки существа 1/1 красный Дьявол. Они имеют способность «Когда это существо умирает, оно наносит 1 повреждение целевому существу или игроку».
foreign_names.flavor: Дьяволы сеют хаос и пожинают панику.

foreign_names.name: 与魔共舞
foreign_names.text: 将两个1/1红色魔鬼衍生生物放进战场。它们具有「当此生物死去时，它对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。」
foreign_names.flavor: 魔鬼播撒混乱，收获恐慌。

foreign_names.name: 與魔共舞
foreign_names.text: 將兩個1/1紅色魔鬼衍生生物放進戰場。它們具有「當此生物死去時，它對目標生物或玩家造成1點傷害。」
foreign_names.flavor: 魔鬼播撒混亂，收獲恐慌。

Devils' Playground.name: Devils' Playground
Devils' Playground.text: Create four 1/1 red Devil creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
Devils' Playground.flavor:
"The city is overrun. I would say burn it to the ground, but that won't be necessary."
—Inquisitor Delmund
Devils' Playground.original_text: Put four 1/1 red Devil creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

foreign_names.name: Spielwiese der Teufel
foreign_names.text: Bringe vier 1/1 rote Teufel-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel. Sie haben „Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, fügt sie einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu."
foreign_names.flavor: „Die Stadt wird überrannt. Ich würde ja sagen, brennt alles nieder, aber das erledigt sich wohl von selbst." —Inquisitor Delmund

foreign_names.name: Patio de demonios
foreign_names.text: Pon en el campo de batalla cuatro fichas de criatura Diablo rojas 1/1. Tienen "Cuando esta criatura muera, hace 1 punto de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo".
foreign_names.flavor: "La ciudad está infestada. Ordenaría quemarla hasta los cimientos, pero no será necesario." —Inquisidor Delmund

foreign_names.name: Terrain de jeu des diables
foreign_names.text: Mettez sur le champ de bataille quatre jetons de créature 1/1 rouge Diable. Ils ont « Quand cette créature meurt, elle inflige 1 blessure à une cible, créature ou joueur. »
foreign_names.flavor: « La ville est envahie. J'aurais donné l'ordre de la réduire en cendres, si ce n'était pas déjà fait. » —Inquisiteur Delmund

foreign_names.name: Campo Giochi dei Diavoli
foreign_names.text: Metti sul campo di battaglia quattro pedine creatura Diavolo 1/1 rosse. Hanno "Quando questa creatura muore, infligge 1 danno a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio".
foreign_names.flavor: "La città è stata invasa. Darei ordine di ridurla in cenere, ma temo non sarà necessario." —Inquisitore Delmund

foreign_names.name: 悪魔の遊び場
foreign_names.text: 赤の１/１のデビル・クリーチャー・トークンを４体戦場に出す。それらは「このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。このクリーチャーはそれに１点のダメージを与える。」を持つ。
foreign_names.flavor: 「都市は大混乱だ。すべて燃やせと言いたいところだが、我々が手を出す余地はないようだ。」 ――審問官デルムンド

foreign_names.name: 악령의 놀이터
foreign_names.text: 1/1 적색 악령 생물 토큰 네 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 토큰들은 "이 생물이 죽을 때, 생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 이 생물은 그 목표에게 피해 1점을 입힌다."를 가진다.
foreign_names.flavor: "도시는 함락됐다. 잿더미로 만들라고 명령하고 싶지만, 굳이 그럴 필요는 없을 것 같군." —심문관 델문드

foreign_names.name: Recreio dos Diabos
foreign_names.text: Coloque no campo de batalha quatro fichas de criatura vermelhas 1/1 do tipo Diabo. Elas têm "Quando esta criatura morre, ela causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo."
foreign_names.flavor: "A cidade foi tomada. Eu diria para queimar e pôr abaixo, mas isso não vai ser necessário." — Inquisidor Delmund

foreign_names.name: Раздолье Дьяволов
foreign_names.text: Положите на поле битвы четыре фишки существа 1/1 красный Дьявол. Они имеют способность «Когда это существо умирает, оно наносит 1 повреждение целевому существу или игроку».
foreign_names.flavor: «Они заполонили весь город. Я бы приказал сжечь его дотла, но это будет излишне». — инквизитор Дельмунд

foreign_names.name: 魔鬼乐土
foreign_names.text: 将四个1/1红色魔鬼衍生生物放进战场。它们具有「当此生物死去时，它对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。」
foreign_names.flavor: 「魔鬼已淹没整座城市。我建议将其烧得片瓦不剩，但不必多此一举了。」 ～审判官戴曼德

foreign_names.name: 魔鬼樂土
foreign_names.text: 將四個1/1紅色魔鬼衍生生物放進戰場。它們具有「當此生物死去時，它對目標生物或玩家造成1點傷害。」
foreign_names.flavor: 「魔鬼已淹沒整座城市。我建議將其燒得片瓦不剩，但不必多此一舉了。」 ～審判官戴曼德

Dissension in the Ranks.name: Dissension in the Ranks
Dissension in the Ranks.text: Target blocking creature fights another target blocking creature.
Dissension in the Ranks.flavor:
"It came on as quickly as taking in a breath of air. Cathars who had fought shoulder to shoulder were at each other's throats. They were not themselves."
—Halmig, Order of Saint Traft
Dissension in the Ranks.original_text: Target blocking creature fights another target blocking creature.

rulings.text: Destroying a blocking creature doesn’t cause the attacking creature it blocked to become unblocked.

foreign_names.name: Zwietracht in den Reihen
foreign_names.text: Eine blockende Kreatur deiner Wahl kämpft gegen eine andere blockende Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreign_names.flavor: „Es geschah in einem Atemzug. Katharer, die Seite an Seite gekämpft hatten, gingen sich gegenseitig an die Gurgel. Sie waren nicht sie selbst." —Halmig, Orden von Sankt Traft

foreign_names.name: Desacuerdo en las filas
foreign_names.text: La criatura bloqueadora objetivo lucha con otra criatura bloqueadora objetivo.
foreign_names.flavor: "Ocurrió en lo que dura un suspiro. Cátaros que habían luchado codo con codo se abalanzaban los unos a los cuellos de los otros. No estaban en sus cabales". —Halmig, Orden de San Traft

foreign_names.name: Dissension dans les rangs
foreign_names.text: La créature bloqueuse ciblée se bat contre une autre créature bloqueuse ciblée.
foreign_names.flavor: « C'est arrivé en un rien de temps. Des cathares qui avaient combattus côte à côte se sautaient à la gorge. Ils n'étaient plus eux-mêmes. » —Halmig, Ordre de Saint Traft

foreign_names.name: Discordia nei Ranghi
foreign_names.text: Una creatura bloccante bersaglio lotta con un'altra creatura bloccante bersaglio.
foreign_names.flavor: "Tutto avvenne nel tempo di un respiro. I catari che avevano combattuto fianco a fianco venivano alle mani gli uni con gli altri. Non erano loro stessi." —Halmig, Ordine di San Traft

foreign_names.name: 内部衝突
foreign_names.text: ブロック・クリーチャー１体と他のブロック・クリーチャー１体を対象とする。その前者はその後者と格闘を行う。
foreign_names.flavor: 「息つく間もありませんでした。一致団結して戦った聖戦士たちが、急に互いの喉元を狙い出したのです。正気を失っていたのでしょう。」 ――聖トラフト騎士団のハルミッグ

foreign_names.name: 부대의 불화
foreign_names.text: 방어생물과 다른 방어생물을 목표로 정한다. 두 방어생물은 서로 싸운다.
foreign_names.flavor: "숨쉬는 것만큼이나 갑작스럽게 벌어진 상황이었다. 어깨를 밀치며 싸우던 성전사들이 서로의 목을 겨누었다. 이들은 모두 이성을 잃었다." —성 트라프트 교단의 할미그

foreign_names.name: Dissenção nas Fileiras
foreign_names.text: A criatura bloqueadora alvo luta com outra criatura bloqueadora alvo.
foreign_names.flavor: "Aconteceu rápido como um suspiro. Cátaros que haviam lutado ombro a ombro partiram para cima uns dos outros. Eles estavam fora de si." — Halmig, da Ordem de Santo Traft

foreign_names.name: Раздоры в Войсках
foreign_names.text: Целевое блокирующее существо дерется с другим целевым блокирующим существом.
foreign_names.flavor: «Все произошло за какое-то мгновение ока. Катары, сражавшиеся плечом к плечу, вцепились друг другу в глотки. Они были сами не свои». — Халмиг из Ордена святого Трафта

foreign_names.name: 军伍内讧
foreign_names.text: 目标进行阻挡的生物与另一个目标进行阻挡的生物互斗。
foreign_names.flavor: 「此事就发生在眨眼之间。原本还并肩作战的护教军突然就拔刀相向。他们都迷失了自我。」 ～圣沙弗骑士团的汉米格

foreign_names.name: 軍伍內訌
foreign_names.text: 目標進行阻擋的生物與另一個目標進行阻擋的生物互鬥。
foreign_names.flavor: 「此事就發生在眨眼之間。原本還並肩作戰的護教軍突然就拔刀相向。他們都迷失了自我。」 ～聖沙弗騎士團的漢米格

Dual Shot.name: Dual Shot
Dual Shot.text: Dual Shot deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
Dual Shot.flavor: There is an eagerness among the Quiver of Kessig to prove they are the equal of the other cathar orders.
Dual Shot.original_text: Dual Shot deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures.

rulings.text: You can’t target the same creature twice to have Dual Shot deal 2 damage to it.

foreign_names.name: Doppelschuss
foreign_names.text: Der Doppelschuss fügt bis zu zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl je 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreign_names.flavor: Die Mitglieder der Kessig-Schar wollen voller Eifer beweisen, dass sie den anderen Orden der Katharer ebenbürtig sind.

foreign_names.name: Doble disparo
foreign_names.text: El Doble disparo hace 1 punto de daño a cada una de hasta dos criaturas objetivo.
foreign_names.flavor: En el Carcaj de Kessig hay cierta ansia por demostrar que no tienen nada que envidiar a otras órdenes cátaras.

foreign_names.name: Tir double
foreign_names.text: Ciblez jusqu'à deux créatures. Le Tir double leur inflige 1 blessure à chacune.
foreign_names.flavor: Les membres du Carquois de Kessig veulent prouver qu'ils sont les égaux des autres ordres cathares.

foreign_names.name: Colpo Duplice
foreign_names.text: Scegli fino a due creature bersaglio. Il Colpo Duplice infligge 1 danno a ciascuna di esse.
foreign_names.flavor: I membri della Faretra di Kessig fremono per dimostrare di essere all'altezza degli altri ordini di catari.

foreign_names.name: 両手撃ち
foreign_names.text: クリーチャー最大２体を対象とする。両手撃ちはそれらにそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。
foreign_names.flavor: ケッシグの矢筒には、自分たちが他の聖戦士騎士団と対等だと証明したい気持ちが満ちている。

foreign_names.name: 연발 사격
foreign_names.text: 최대 두 개까지의 생물을 목표로 정한다. 연발 사격은 그 생물들에게 각각 피해 1점을 입힌다.
foreign_names.flavor: 케시그 궁사들 사이에는 다른 성전사단에 뒤지지 않는다는 것을 증명하고 싶은 열의가 있었다.

foreign_names.name: Tiro Duplo
foreign_names.text: Tiro Duplo causa 1 ponto de dano a cada uma de até duas criaturas alvo.
foreign_names.flavor: Há na Aljava de Kessig uma ânsia por provar que estão em pé de igualdade com as outras ordens dos cátaros.

foreign_names.name: Двойной Выстрел
foreign_names.text: Двойной Выстрел наносит по 1 повреждению каждому из не более двух целевых существ.
foreign_names.flavor: Колчан Кессига стремится доказать, что ничем не уступает другим орденам катаров.

foreign_names.name: 接连射击
