Falkenrath Gorger.name: Falkenrath Gorger
Falkenrath Gorger.text: Each Vampire creature card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Falkenrath Gorger.original_text: Each Vampire creature card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Falkenrath Gorger’s ability only applies while it’s on the battlefield. If you discard it, it won’t give itself madness.

If Falkenrath Gorger leaves the battlefield before the madness trigger has resolved for a Vampire card that gained madness with its ability, the madness ability will still let you cast that Vampire card for the appropriate cost even though it no longer has madness.

If you discard a Vampire creature card that already has a madness ability, you’ll choose which madness ability exiles it. You may choose either the one it normally has or the one it gains from Falkenrath Gorger.
Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its mana value. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

Flameblade Angel.flavor: "You must pay for your sin in blood."
Flameblade Angel.original_text:
Flying
Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you or a permanent you control, you may have Flameblade Angel deal 1 damage to that source's controller.

rulings.text: If a source deals damage to you and/or one or more permanents you control at the same time, Flameblade Angel’s last ability will trigger that many times. For example, if a creature with trample deals damage to a blocking creature you control and you, Flameblade Angel’s ability will trigger two times.

Note that the last ability is optional. Say two players each control a Flameblade Angel, and a source controlled by the first player deals damage to the second player or a permanent they control. The resulting triggered ability may deal damage to the first player, causing the ability of that player’s Flameblade Angel to trigger. That ability may deal damage to the second player, and so on. This cycle will repeat until the game ends or one player declines to use the ability, putting an end to the carnage.

rulings.text: The abilities that transform a Werewolf back and forth look at the entire previous turn, even if the Werewolf with that ability wasn’t on the battlefield for some or all of that turn.

To trigger the Werewolf’s back face’s transform ability, a single player must have cast two or more spells during the previous turn. If multiple players each cast just one spell during the previous turn, the ability won’t trigger.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

foreign_names.text:

Geier Reach Bandit // Vildin-Pack Alpha.name: Geier Reach Bandit // Vildin-Pack Alpha
Geier Reach Bandit // Vildin-Pack Alpha.text:
Whenever a Werewolf enters the battlefield under your control, you may transform it.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Vildin-Pack Alpha.
Geier Reach Bandit // Vildin-Pack Alpha.original_text:
Whenever a Werewolf enters the battlefield under your control, you may transform it.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Vildin-Pack Alpha.

rulings.text: The abilities that transform a Werewolf back and forth look at the entire previous turn, even if the Werewolf with that ability wasn’t on the battlefield for some or all of that turn.
If you control three Vildin-Pack Alphas and a Werewolf enters the battlefield under your control, you may transform it, transform it again, and transform it a third time.

If a creature with haste transforms and no longer has haste on the same turn that it comes under your control, such as if you cast a Geier Reach Bandit when you already control a Vildin-Pack Alpha, it won’t be able to attack that turn.

To trigger the Werewolf’s back face’s transform ability, a single player must have cast two or more spells during the previous turn. If multiple players each cast just one spell during the previous turn, the ability won’t trigger.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

foreign_names.name: Banditin vom Geierberg // Alphatier des Vildin-Rudels

Geistblast.name: Geistblast
Geistblast.text:
Geistblast deals 2 damage to any target.
{2}{U}, Exile Geistblast from your graveyard: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Geistblast.original_text:
Geistblast deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{2}{U}, Exile Geistblast from your graveyard: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

rulings.text: Geistblast’s ability can copy any instant or sorcery spell, not just one with targets.

When Geistblast’s ability resolves, it creates a copy of the instant or sorcery spell. The copy is created on the stack, so it’s not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won’t trigger. The copy will then resolve like a normal spell, before the original spell resolves but after players get a chance to cast spells and activate abilities.

The copy will have the same targets as the spell it’s copying unless you choose new ones. You may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. If, for one of the targets, you can’t choose a new legal target, then it remains unchanged (even if the current target is illegal).
If the spell being copied is modal (that is, it says “Choose one —” or the like), the copy will have the same mode. You can’t choose a different one.
If the spell being copied has an X whose value was determined as it was cast (like Avacyn’s Judgment’s madness cost has), the copy will have the same value of X.
If the spell has damage divided as it was cast (also like Avacyn’s Judgment), the division can’t be changed (although the targets receiving that damage still can).
If an alternative cost was paid for the spell, such as its madness cost or surge cost, the same alternative cost is considered to have been paid for the copy.

foreign_names.name: Geisterblitz
foreign_names.text:
Der Geisterblitz fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
{2}{U}, schicke den Geisterblitz aus deinem Friedhof ins Exil: Kopiere einen Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei deiner Wahl, den bzw. die du kontrollierst. Du kannst neue Ziele für die Kopie bestimmen.

foreign_names.name: Ráfaga geist
foreign_names.text:
La Ráfaga geist hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.
{2}{U}, exiliar la Ráfaga geist de tu cementerio: Copia el hechizo de instantáneo o de conjuro objetivo que controlas. Puedes elegir nuevos objetivos para la copia.

foreign_names.name: Salve de geist
foreign_names.text:
La Salve de geist inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur.
{2}{U}, exilez la Salve de geist depuis votre cimetière : Copiez un sort d'éphémère ou de rituel ciblé que vous contrôlez. Vous pouvez choisir de nouvelles cibles pour cette copie.

foreign_names.name: Geistflusso
foreign_names.text:
Il Geistflusso infligge 2 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.
{2}{U}, Esilia il Geistflusso dal tuo cimitero: Copia una magia istantaneo o stregoneria bersaglio che controlli. Puoi scegliere nuovi bersagli per la copia.

foreign_names.name: 霊魂破
foreign_names.text:
クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。霊魂破はそれに２点のダメージを与える。
{2}{U}, あなたの墓地から霊魂破を追放する：あなたがコントロールする、インスタント・呪文１つかソーサリー・呪文１つを対象とし、それをコピーする。あなたはそのコピーの新しい対象を選んでもよい。

foreign_names.name: 심령폭발
foreign_names.text:
생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 심령폭발은 그 목표에 피해 2점을 입힌다.
{2}{U}, 당신의 무덤에서 심령폭발을 추방한다: 당신이 조종하는 순간마법이나 집중마법 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 복사한다. 당신은 그 복사본의 목표를 새로 정할 수 있다.

foreign_names.name: Raio de Geist
foreign_names.text:
Raio de Geist causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.
{2}{U}, Exile Raio de Geist de seu cemitério: Copie a mágica instantânea ou feitiço alvo que você controla. Você pode escolher novos alvos para a cópia.

foreign_names.name: Призрачный Заряд
foreign_names.text:
Призрачный Заряд наносит 2 повреждения целевому существу или игроку.
{2}{U}, изгоните Призрачный Заряд из вашего кладбища: скопируйте целевое мгновенное заклинание или заклинание волшебства под вашим контролем. Вы можете выбрать новые цели для этой копии.

foreign_names.name: 游魂击
foreign_names.text:
游魂击对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害。
{2}{U}，从你的坟墓场放逐游魂击：复制目标由你操控的瞬间或法术咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

foreign_names.name: 遊魂擊
foreign_names.text:
遊魂擊對目標生物或玩家造成2點傷害。
{2}{U}，從你的墳墓場放逐遊魂擊：複製目標由你操控的瞬間或巫術咒語。你可以為該複製品選擇新的目標。

Gibbering Fiend.name: Gibbering Fiend
Gibbering Fiend.text:
When Gibbering Fiend enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Gibbering Fiend deals 1 damage to that player.
Gibbering Fiend.original_text:
When Gibbering Fiend enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, Gibbering Fiend deals 1 damage to that player.

rulings.text: The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Most triggered delirium abilities use an intervening “if” clause. There must be four or more card types among cards in your graveyard in order for these abilities to trigger, otherwise they never trigger at all. There’s no way to have the ability trigger if there aren’t enough card types, even if you intend to raise that number in response to the triggered ability. The number of card types is checked again as the trigger resolves, and if it has become too low somehow, the ability does nothing. If which card types are in your graveyard changes but the quantity of card types stays the same (or increases), then the delirium triggered ability will still resolve.

foreign_names.name: Geifernder Unhold
foreign_names.text:
Wenn der Geifernde Unhold ins Spiel kommt, fügt er jedem Gegner 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
Delirium — Zu Beginn des Versorgungssegments jedes Gegners und falls dein Friedhof vier oder mehr unterschiedliche Kartentypen enthält, fügt der Geifernde Unhold diesem Spieler 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreign_names.name: Demonio farfullador
foreign_names.text:
Cuando el Demonio farfullador entre al campo de batalla, hace 1 punto de daño a cada oponente.
Delirio — Al comienzo del mantenimiento de cada oponente, si entre las cartas de tu cementerio hay cuatro o más tipos de cartas, el Demonio farfullador hace 1 punto de daño a ese jugador.

foreign_names.name: Fielleux ricanant
foreign_names.text:
Quand le Fielleux ricanant arrive sur le champ de bataille, il inflige 1 blessure à chaque adversaire.
Délire — Au début de l'entretien de chaque adversaire, s'il y a au moins quatre types de carte parmi les cartes de votre cimetière, le Fielleux ricanant inflige 1 blessure à ce joueur.

foreign_names.name: Immondo Farfugliante
foreign_names.text:
Quando l'Immondo Farfugliante entra nel campo di battaglia, infligge 1 danno a ogni avversario.
Delirio — All'inizio del mantenimento di ogni avversario, se ci sono quattro o più tipi di carta tra le carte nel tuo cimitero, l'Immondo Farfugliante infligge 1 danno a quel giocatore.

foreign_names.name: つぶやく悪鬼
foreign_names.text:
つぶやく悪鬼が戦場に出たとき、これは各対戦相手にそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。
昂揚 ― 各対戦相手のアップキープの開始時に、あなたの墓地にあるカードにカード・タイプが合計４種類以上含まれる場合、つぶやく悪鬼はそのプレイヤーに１点のダメージを与える。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — デビル

foreign_names.name: 횡설수설하는 마귀
foreign_names.text:
횡설수설하는 마귀가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대를 목표로 정한다. 횡설수설하는 마귀는 각 상대에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.
섬망 — 각 상대의 유지단 시작에, 당신의 무덤에 네 개 이상의 카드 유형이 있다면, 횡설수설하는 마귀는 그 플레이어에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.

foreign_names.name: Diabo Murmurante
foreign_names.text:
Quando Diabo Murmurante entra no campo de batalha, ele causa 1 ponto de dano a cada oponente.
Delírio — No início da manutenção de cada oponente, se houver quatro ou mais tipos de card entre os cards de seu cemitério, Diabo Murmurante causa 1 ponto de dano àquele jogador.

foreign_names.name: Бормочущий Демон
foreign_names.text:
Когда Бормочущий Демон выходит на поле битвы, он наносит по 1 повреждению каждому оппоненту.
Буйство — В начале шага поддержки каждого оппонента, если среди карт на вашем кладбище есть не менее четырех типов карт, Бормочущий Демон наносит 1 повреждение тому игроку.

foreign_names.name: 急叫邪鬼
foreign_names.text:
当急叫邪鬼进战场时，它向每位对手各造成1点伤害。
躁狂～在每位对手的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，则急叫邪鬼对该牌手造成1点伤害。

foreign_names.name: 急叫邪鬼
foreign_names.text:
當急叫邪鬼進戰場時，它向每位對手各造成1點傷害。
躁狂～在每位對手的維持開始時，若你墳墓場中牌的類別有四種或更多，則急叫邪鬼對該玩家造成1點傷害。

Goldnight Castigator.name: Goldnight Castigator
Goldnight Castigator.text:
Flying, haste
If a source would deal damage to you, it deals double that damage to you instead.
If a source would deal damage to Goldnight Castigator, it deals double that damage to Goldnight Castigator instead.
Goldnight Castigator.original_text:
Flying, haste
If a source would deal damage to you, it deals double that damage to you instead.
If a source would deal damage to Goldnight Castigator, it deals double that damage to Goldnight Castigator instead.

rulings.text: If multiple replacement effects could apply to damage being dealt to you or Goldnight Castigator, you choose the order to apply those effects.

If you control two Goldnight Castigators and a source would deal damage to you, it deals four times that much damage instead. If you control a third Goldnight Castigator, the source deals eight times that much damage to you, and so on. Damage dealt to a Goldnight Castigator is only doubled, regardless of how many are on the battlefield.

foreign_names.name: Goldnacht-Züchtigerin
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend, Eile
Falls dir eine Quelle Schadenspunkte zufügen würde, fügt sie dir stattdessen doppelt so viele Schadenspunkte zu.
Falls eine Quelle der Goldnacht-Züchtigerin Schadenspunkte zufügen würde, fügt sie der Goldnacht-Züchtigerin stattdessen doppelt so viele Schadenspunkte zu.

foreign_names.name: Castigadora de la Noche Dorada
foreign_names.text:
Vuela, prisa.
Si una fuente fuera a hacerte daño, en vez de eso, te hace el doble de ese daño.
Si una fuente fuera a hacer daño a la Castigadora de la Noche Dorada, en vez de eso, hace el doble de ese daño a la Castigadora de la Noche Dorada.

foreign_names.name: Châtieuse d'Ornuit
foreign_names.text:
Vol, célérité
Si une source devait vous infliger des blessures, elle vous inflige le double de ces blessures à la place.
Si une source devait infliger des blessures à la Châtieuse d'Ornuit, elle inflige le double de ces blessures à la Châtieuse d'Ornuit à la place.

foreign_names.name: Punitrice della Notte Dorata
foreign_names.text:
Volare, rapidità
Se una fonte sta per infliggerti danno, ti infligge invece il doppio di quel danno.
Se una fonte sta per infliggere danno alla Punitrice della Notte Dorata, le infligge invece il doppio di quel danno.

foreign_names.name: 黄金夜の懲罰者
foreign_names.text:
飛行、速攻
発生源があなたにダメージを与えるなら、代わりに、それはあなたにその点数の２倍のダメージを与える。
発生源が黄金夜の懲罰者にダメージを与えるなら、代わりに、それは黄金夜の懲罰者にその点数の２倍のダメージを与える。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 天使

foreign_names.name: 황금야 징벌자
foreign_names.text:
비행, 신속
어느 원천이 당신에게 피해를 입히려 한다면, 대신 그 원천은 피해를 두 배로 입힌다.
어느 원천이 황금야 징벌자에게 피해를 입히려 한다면, 대신 그 원천은 피해를 두 배로 입힌다.

foreign_names.name: Castigadora Noite Dourada
foreign_names.text:
Voar, ímpeto
Se uma fonte causaria dano a você, em vez disso, ela causa o dobro daquele dano a você.
Se uma fonte causaria dano a Castigadora Noite Dourada, em vez disso, ela causa o dobro daquele dano a Castigadora Noite Dourada.

foreign_names.name: Палач Золотой Ночи
foreign_names.text:
Полет, Ускорение
Если источник должен нанести вам повреждения, вместо этого он наносит вам те повреждения в двойном размере.
Если источник должен нанести повреждения Палачу Золотой Ночи, вместо этого он наносит Палачу Золотой Ночи те повреждения в двойном размере.

foreign_names.name: 金夜惩恶使
foreign_names.text:
飞行，敏捷
如果某来源将对你造成伤害，则改为它对你造成两倍的伤害。
如果某来源将对金夜惩恶使造成伤害，则改为它对金夜惩恶使造成两倍的伤害。

foreign_names.name: 金夜懲惡使
foreign_names.text:
飛行，敏捷
如果某來源將對你造成傷害，則改為它對你造成兩倍的傷害。
如果某來源將對金夜懲惡使造成傷害，則改為它對金夜懲惡使造成兩倍的傷害。

Harness the Storm.name: Harness the Storm
Harness the Storm.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, you may cast target card with the same name as that spell from your graveyard. (You still pay its costs.)
Harness the Storm.flavor:
"There is no place like a rooftop laboratory in a lightning storm. It's where genius strikes."
—Renna, Selhoff alchemist
Harness the Storm.original_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, you may cast target card with the same name as that spell from your graveyard. (You still pay its costs.)

rulings.text: You must choose a target for Harness the Storm’s ability (if one exists) immediately after you’ve cast an instant or sorcery spell. There’s no way for that spell to be countered and then targeted by Harness the Storm once it’s in the graveyard.

You choose whether to cast the targeted card as the ability resolves. You can’t wait to cast it later, and there’s no way for your opponents to set up a situation where you have to cast the card but don’t want to.
If the spell you cast from your hand is countered in response to Harness the Storm’s triggered ability, you can still cast the target card while the ability is resolving.

Because you’re paying the spell’s costs, you can pay alternative costs, such as awaken costs and surge costs from the Battle for Zendikar block. You can also pay additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the card has a mandatory additional cost, like Lightning Axe, you must pay it to cast the card.
The spell you cast from your graveyard can target the spell you cast from your hand.
The spell you cast from your graveyard resolves before the spell you cast from your hand. It’s put into your graveyard as it resolves.

foreign_names.name: Gezügelter Sturm
foreign_names.text: Immer wenn du einen Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei aus deiner Hand wirkst, kannst du eine Karte deiner Wahl mit dem gleichen Namen wie jener Zauberspruch aus deinem Friedhof wirken. (Du bezahlst immer noch seine Kosten.)
foreign_names.flavor: „Es gibt keinen besseren Ort als ein Dachlaboratorium während eines Gewittersturms. Dort hat man wahre Geistesblitze." —Renna, Sehlhof-Alchemistin

foreign_names.name: Domeñar la tormenta
foreign_names.text: Siempre que lances un hechizo de instantáneo o de conjuro de tu mano, puedes lanzar la carta objetivo con el mismo nombre que ese hechizo de tu cementerio. (Sigues pagando sus costes.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Ningún lugar puede compararse a un laboratorio en una azotea durante una tormenta eléctrica. Ahí es donde tienen lugar los golpes de genialidad." —Renna, alquimista de Selhoff

foreign_names.name: Maîtriser la tempête
foreign_names.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort d'éphémère ou de rituel depuis votre main, vous pouvez lancer une carte ciblée ayant le même nom que ce sort depuis votre cimetière. (Vous payez toujours ses coûts.)
foreign_names.flavor: « Rien ne vaut un laboratoire sur un toit pendant un orage. C'est là que frappent les éclairs de génie. » —Renna, alchimiste de Selhoff

foreign_names.name: Imbrigliare la Tempesta
foreign_names.text: Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia istantaneo o stregoneria dalla tua mano, puoi lanciare una carta bersaglio con lo stesso nome di quella magia dal tuo cimitero. (Paghi comunque i suoi costi.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Durante una tempesta di fulmini, non c'è posto migliore di un laboratorio su un tetto per farsi venire un colpo di genio." —Rhenna, alchimista di Selhoff

foreign_names.name: 嵐の活用
foreign_names.text: あなたがあなたの手札からインスタント・呪文１つかソーサリー・呪文１つを唱えるたび、あなたの墓地からその呪文と同じ名前を持つカード１枚を対象とする。あなたはそれを唱えてもよい。（そのコストは支払う必要がある。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「屋根の上の研究所ほど嵐の夜にいい場所はない。そこに天才が現れるのよ。」 ――セルホフの錬金術師、レナ

foreign_names.name: 폭풍우 소환
foreign_names.text: 당신이 손에서 순간마법이나 집중마법 주문을 발동할 때마다, 당신의 무덤에 있는 카드 중 그 주문과 이름이 같은 카드를 목표로 정한다. 당신은 그 카드를 발동할 수 있다. (여전히 발동 비용은 지불해야 한다.)
foreign_names.flavor: "벼락폭풍이 치는 날에는 지붕 실험실만한 장소가 없어. 천재적인 발상이 떠오르거든." —셀호프 연금술사 레나

foreign_names.name: Comandar a Tempestade
foreign_names.text: Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica instantânea ou feitiço de sua mão, você pode conjurar o card alvo com o mesmo nome daquela mágica do seu cemitério. (Você ainda paga seus custos.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Não há lugar como o telhado de um laboratório em uma tempestade de raios. É onde lampeja a genialidade." — Renna, alquimista de Selhoff

foreign_names.name: Укрощение Бури
foreign_names.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете мгновенное заклинание или заклинание волшебства из вашей руки, вы можете разыграть целевую карту с тем же именем, что у того заклинания, из вашего кладбища. (Вы должны оплатить ее стоимости.)
foreign_names.flavor: «Когда на улице буря и сверкают молнии, нет места лучше, чем лаборатория на крыше. Именно там тебя может поразить гениальное озарение». — Ренна, алхимик из Селхоффа

foreign_names.name: 掌驭风暴
foreign_names.text: 每当你从你手上施放瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以从你的坟墓场施放目标与该咒语同名的牌。（你依旧要支付其费用。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「没什么比雷电交加的屋顶实验室更好的地方了。那才是天才显威之处。」 ～塞贺炼金术士蕾娜

foreign_names.name: 掌馭風暴
foreign_names.text: 每當你從你手上施放瞬間或巫術咒語時，你可以從你的墳墓場施放目標與該咒語同名的牌。（你依舊要支付其費用。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「沒什麼比雷電交加的屋頂實驗室更好的地方了。那才是天才顯威之處。」 ～塞賀鍊金術士蕾娜

Howlpack Wolf.name: Howlpack Wolf
Howlpack Wolf.text: Howlpack Wolf can't block unless you control another Wolf or Werewolf.
Howlpack Wolf.flavor: Wolves and werewolves join together for the common cause of the hunt.
Howlpack Wolf.original_text: Howlpack Wolf can't block unless you control another Wolf or Werewolf.

rulings.text: If you control a second Howlpack Wolf, they can both block.

foreign_names.name: Heulerrudel-Wolf
foreign_names.text: Der Heulerrudel-Wolf kann nicht blocken, es sei denn, du kontrollierst einen anderen Wolf oder Werwolf.
foreign_names.flavor: Wölfe und Werwölfe tun sich für die gemeinsame Jagd zusammen.

foreign_names.name: Lobo de la jauría aullante
foreign_names.text: El Lobo de la jauría aullante no puede bloquear a menos que controles otro Lobo o Licántropo.
foreign_names.flavor: Los lobos y los licántropos se unen por la causa común de la caza.

foreign_names.name: Loup de la hurlemeute
foreign_names.text: Le Loup de la hurlemeute ne peut pas bloquer à moins que vous ne contrôliez un autre loup ou loup-garou.
foreign_names.flavor: Les loups et les loups-garous s'unissent pour faire chasse commune.

foreign_names.name: Lupo dell'Ulubranco
foreign_names.text: Il Lupo dell'Ulubranco non può bloccare a meno che tu non controlli un altro Lupo o Mannaro.
foreign_names.flavor: Lupi e mannari si uniscono per la causa comune della caccia.

foreign_names.name: 吠え群れの狼
foreign_names.text: あなたが他の狼か他の狼男をコントロールしていないかぎり、吠え群れの狼ではブロックできない。
foreign_names.flavor: 狼と人狼は狩りを協力して行う。

foreign_names.name: 표효떼 늑대
foreign_names.text: 당신이 다른 늑대나 늑대인간을 조종하지 않는 한, 표효떼 늑대는 방어할 수 없다.
foreign_names.flavor: 늑대와 늑대인간은 동일한 목적을 가지고 함께 사냥한다.

foreign_names.name: Lobo da Alcateia Uivante
foreign_names.text: Lobo da Alcateia Uivante não pode bloquear a menos que você controle outro Lobo ou Lobisomem.
foreign_names.flavor: Lobos e lobisomens se unem por uma causa em comum na caçada.

foreign_names.name: Волк из Воющей Стаи
foreign_names.text: Волк из Воющей Стаи не может блокировать, если только под вашим контролем нет другого Волка или Вервольфа.
foreign_names.flavor: Волки и вервольфы готовы объединиться ради удачной охоты.

foreign_names.name: 嚎群狼
foreign_names.text: 除非你操控另一个狼或狼人，否则嚎群狼不能进行阻挡。
foreign_names.flavor: 狼群和狼人齐心狩猎。

foreign_names.name: 嚎群狼
foreign_names.text: 除非你操控另一個狼或狼人，否則嚎群狼不能進行阻擋。
foreign_names.flavor: 狼群和狼人齊心狩獵。

Hulking Devil.name: Hulking Devil
Hulking Devil.flavor: Fear the patient devil, the one who is calm in the midst of chaos. Beware the silent devil, the one whose cackle does not mingle with the others.

foreign_names.name: Grobschlächtiger Teufel
foreign_names.flavor: Fürchte den geduldigen Teufel, der ruhig inmitten des Chaos wartet. Fürchte den stillen Teufel, der nicht hämisch mit den anderen kichert.

foreign_names.name: Diablo corpulento
foreign_names.flavor: Teme al diablo paciente, al que está tranquilo en medio del caos. Recela del diablo silencioso, cuyas palabras no se mezclan con las de los demás.

foreign_names.name: Diable lourdaud
foreign_names.flavor: Craignez le diable patient, celui qui est calme au milieu du chaos. Méfiez-vous du diable silencieux, celui qui ne glousse pas avec les autres.

foreign_names.name: Diavolo Massiccio
foreign_names.flavor: Temi il diavolo paziente, che rimane calmo in mezzo al caos. Guardati dal diavolo silenzioso, i cui schiamazzi non si mischiano con gli altri.

foreign_names.name: 巨体の悪魔
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — デビル
foreign_names.flavor: 混沌の渦中で冷静なおとなしい悪魔に気をつけろ。周りと一緒に叫ばない静かな悪魔に用心しろ。

foreign_names.name: 거대한 악령
foreign_names.flavor: 참을성이 강한 악령을 두려워하라. 이들은 혼돈 속에서도 평정심을 유지한다. 말 없는 악령을 조심하라. 이들은 다른 악령들과 함께 있을 때도 소리내어 웃지 않는다.

foreign_names.name: Diabo Brutamontes
foreign_names.flavor: Tema o diabo paciente, aquele que está calmo em meio ao caos. Cuidado com o diabo silencioso, aquele cuja gargalhada não se mistura com a dos outros.

foreign_names.name: Громадный Дьявол
foreign_names.flavor: Бойся терпеливого дьявола, что спокоен посреди хаоса. Опасайся молчаливого дьявола, чей хохот не звучит в общем хоре.

foreign_names.name: 巨身魔鬼
foreign_names.flavor: 敬畏耐心的魔鬼，它们在混乱中保持冷静。留心沉默的魔鬼，它们的笑声与众不同。

foreign_names.name: 巨身魔鬼
foreign_names.flavor: 敬畏耐心的魔鬼，他們在混亂中保持冷靜。留心沉默的魔鬼，他們的笑聲與眾不同。

Incorrigible Youths.name: Incorrigible Youths
Incorrigible Youths.text:
Haste
Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Incorrigible Youths.original_text:
Haste
Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its converted mana cost. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

foreign_names.name: Unverbesserliche Halbwüchsige
foreign_names.text:
Eile
Wahnsinn {2}{R} (Falls du diese Karte abwirfst, wirf sie ins Exil ab. Wenn du dies tust, wirke sie für ihre Wahnsinn-Kosten oder lege sie auf deinen Friedhof.)
foreign_names.flavor: „Hach, wieder jung zu sein …" —Olivia Voldaren

foreign_names.name: Jóvenes incorregibles
foreign_names.text:
Prisa.
Demencia {2}{R}. (Si descartas esta carta, exíliala. Cuando lo hagas, lánzala por su coste de demencia o ponla en tu cementerio.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Juventud, divino tesoro". —Olivia Voldaren

foreign_names.name: Jeunes incorrigibles
foreign_names.text:
Célérité
Folie {2}{R} (Si vous vous défaussez de cette carte, défaussez-vous en vers l'exil. Quand vous le faites, lancez-la pour son coût de folie ou mettez-la dans votre cimetière.)
foreign_names.flavor: « Ah, si je pouvais retrouver ma jeunesse. » —Olivia Voldaren

foreign_names.name: Giovani Incorreggibili
foreign_names.text:
Rapidità
Follia {2}{R} (Se scarti questa carta, scartala in esilio. Quando lo fai, lanciala pagando il suo costo di follia o mettila nel tuo cimitero.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Ah, tornare giovani..." —Olivia Voldaren

foreign_names.name: 手に負えない若輩
foreign_names.text:
速攻
マッドネス{2}{R}（あなたがこのカードを捨てるなら、これを追放領域に捨てる。あなたがそうしたとき、マッドネス・コストでこれを唱えるか、これをあなたの墓地に置く。）
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼
foreign_names.flavor: 「あぁ、また若人になりたいわ。」 ――オリヴィア・ヴォルダーレン

foreign_names.name: 구제 불능 아이들
foreign_names.text:
신속
광기 {2}{R} (이 카드를 버리는 경우, 추방 영역에 버린다. 그렇게 할 때, 광기 비용을 지불하고 이 카드를 발동하거나 당신의 무덤에 이 카드를 놓는다.)
foreign_names.flavor: "아...다시 젊어지는 기분이란." —올리비아 볼다렌

foreign_names.name: Jovens Incorrigíveis
foreign_names.text:
Ímpeto
Loucura {2}{R} (Se você descartar este card, descarte-o para o exílio. Quando fizer isso, conjure-o por seu custo de loucura ou coloque-o em seu cemitério.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Ah, se eu fosse jovem de novo..." — Olivia Voldaren

foreign_names.name: Неисправимая Молодежь
foreign_names.text:
Ускорение
Бешенство {2}{R} (Если вы сбрасываете эту карту, сбросьте ее в изгнание. Когда вы это делаете, разыграйте ее за ее стоимость Бешенства или положите на ваше кладбище.)
foreign_names.flavor: «Как хорошо вновь стать молодым». — Оливия Волдарен

foreign_names.name: 无度青年
foreign_names.text:
敏捷
疯魔{2}{R}（如果你弃掉此牌，将之弃到放逐区。当你如此作时，支付其疯魔费用施放之，否则便将其置入你的坟墓场。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「啊，青春又回来了。」 ～奥莉薇亚沃达连

foreign_names.name: 無度青年
foreign_names.text:
敏捷
瘋魔{2}{R}（如果你棄掉此牌，將之棄到放逐區。當你如此作時，支付其瘋魔費用施放之，否則便將其置入你的墳墓場。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「啊，青春又回來了。」 ～奧莉薇亞沃達連

Inner Struggle.name: Inner Struggle
Inner Struggle.text: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
Inner Struggle.flavor:
"Reflect upon your evils lest they reflect upon you."
—Inquisitor Laerin
Inner Struggle.original_text: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

foreign_names.name: Innere Zerrissenheit
foreign_names.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl fügt sich selbst Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.
foreign_names.flavor: „Setze dich mit deiner finsteren Seite auseinander, bevor sie sich mit dir auseinandersetzt." —Inquisitorin Laerin

foreign_names.name: Lucha interna
foreign_names.text: La criatura objetivo se hace una cantidad de daño igual a su fuerza a sí misma.
foreign_names.flavor: "Reflexiona sobre tus errores si no quieres que se vuelvan contra ti". —Inquisidora Laerin

foreign_names.name: Lutte intérieure
foreign_names.text: La créature ciblée s'inflige un nombre de blessures égal à sa force.
foreign_names.flavor: « Examinez vos démons avant qu'ils ne se reflètent sur vous. » —Inquisiteur Laërin

foreign_names.name: Conflitto Interiore
foreign_names.text: Una creatura bersaglio infligge danno a se stessa pari alla propria forza.
foreign_names.flavor: "Riflettete sui vostri peccati o essi si rifletteranno su di voi." —Inquisitrice Laerin

foreign_names.name: 内面の葛藤
foreign_names.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それは自身に、自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。
foreign_names.flavor: 「不正がその身に返らぬよう、身の不正を省みることだ。」 ――審問官レイリン

foreign_names.name: 내면의 투쟁
foreign_names.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 자신에게 자신의 공격력만큼의 피해를 입힌다.
foreign_names.flavor: "사악함에 빠지지 않으려면 자신의 사악한 행동을 반성해야 한다." —심문관 레이린

foreign_names.name: Conflito Interno
foreign_names.text: A criatura alvo causa a si própria uma quantidade de dano igual ao seu poder.
foreign_names.flavor: "Reflita sobre seu mal para que ele não se reflita sobre você." — Inquisidora Laerin

foreign_names.name: Внутренняя Борьба
foreign_names.text: Целевое существо наносит самому себе повреждения, равные своей силе.
foreign_names.flavor: «Борись с самим собой, чтобы не стать собственной жертвой». — инквизитор Лейрин

foreign_names.name: 内心挣扎
foreign_names.text: 目标生物对本身造成等同于其力量的伤害。
foreign_names.flavor: 「自省内心的阴暗，否则它们就会取代你。」 ～审判官蕾琳

foreign_names.name: 內心掙扎
foreign_names.text: 目標生物對本身造成等同於其力量的傷害。
foreign_names.flavor: 「自省內心的陰暗，否則它們就會取代你。」 ～審判官蕾琳

Insolent Neonate.name: Insolent Neonate
Insolent Neonate.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Discard a card, Sacrifice Insolent Neonate: Draw a card.
Insolent Neonate.original_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Discard a card, Sacrifice Insolent Neonate: Draw a card.

foreign_names.name: Anmaßender Neugeborener
foreign_names.text:

Kessig Forgemaster // Flameheart Werewol.name: Kessig Forgemaster // Flameheart Werewolf
Kessig Forgemaster // Flameheart Werewol.text:
Whenever Flameheart Werewolf blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Flameheart Werewolf deals 2 damage to that creature.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Flameheart Werewolf.
Kessig Forgemaster // Flameheart Werewol.original_text:
Whenever Flameheart Werewolf blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Flameheart Werewolf deals 2 damage to that creature.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Flameheart Werewolf.

rulings.text: Kessig Forgemaster’s first ability triggers once for each creature blocking or blocked by it. The ability resolves and deals damage to that creature before combat damage is dealt. If that damage destroys a creature blocking Kessig Forgemaster, Kessig Forgemaster doesn’t become unblocked.
The abilities that transform a Werewolf back and forth look at the entire previous turn, even if the Werewolf with that ability wasn’t on the battlefield for some or all of that turn.

Flameheart Werewolf’s first ability triggers once for each creature blocking or blocked by it. The ability resolves and deals damage to that creature before combat damage is dealt. If that damage destroys a creature blocking Flameheart Werewolf, Flameheart Werewolf doesn’t become unblocked.

To trigger the Werewolf’s back face’s transform ability, a single player must have cast two or more spells during the previous turn. If multiple players each cast just one spell during the previous turn, the ability won’t trigger.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

foreign_names.name: Kessig-Schmiedemeisterin // Flammenherz-Werwölfin
foreign_names.text:

Magmatic Chasm.name: Magmatic Chasm
Magmatic Chasm.text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

rulings.text: Because Magmatic Chasm’s effect doesn’t change the characteristics of any permanents, the set of creatures affected by Magmatic Chasm is constantly updated. Creatures without flying that enter the battlefield later in the turn won’t be able to block.

Malevolent Whispers.name: Malevolent Whispers
Malevolent Whispers.text:
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Malevolent Whispers.original_text:
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its converted mana cost. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.
Malevolent Whispers can target any creature, even one that’s untapped or one you already control.
Gaining control of a creature doesn’t cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it, even though those remain attached to it.

Scourge Wolf.name: Scourge Wolf
Scourge Wolf.text:
First strike
Delirium — Scourge Wolf has double strike as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Scourge Wolf.original_text:
First strike
Delirium — Scourge Wolf has double strike as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Senseless Rage.name: Senseless Rage
Senseless Rage.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Senseless Rage.original_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its converted mana cost. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. Any opponent may have you put that card into your graveyard. If a player does, Sin Prodder deals damage to that player equal to that card's mana value. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.
Sin Prodder.original_text:
Menace
At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. Any opponent may have you put that card into your graveyard. If a player does, Sin Prodder deals damage to that player equal to that card's converted mana cost. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

rulings.text: Each opponent in turn order, starting with the one after you in turn order, may choose to have you put that card into your graveyard. Once a player does so, Sin Prodder deals damage equal to that card’s converted mana cost to that player immediately and Sin Prodder’s trigger has no further action.

Skin Invasion // Skin Shedder.name: Skin Invasion // Skin Shedder
Skin Invasion // Skin Shedder.flavor:
"Patient complained of burning sensation in upper back and at base of neck. Bed rest recommended. In a couple days, he should feel like a new man."
—Lagra, hamlet physician

rulings.text: The controller of Skin Invasion, not the controller of the enchanted creature, returns Skin Invasion to the battlefield transformed.
The enchanted creature’s controller still chooses which player or planeswalker that creature attacks.

If, during your declare attackers step, the enchanted creature is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having that creature attack, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to attack in that case either.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

Stensia Masquerade.name: Stensia Masquerade
Stensia Masquerade.text:
Attacking creatures you control have first strike.
Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
Stensia Masquerade.original_text:
Attacking creatures you control have first strike.
Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Losing or gaining first strike after first-strike damage has been dealt won’t cause a creature to deal combat damage twice or to not deal combat damage.
Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player’s hand. Effects that put cards from a player’s library into that player’s graveyard do not cause those cards to be discarded.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it’s put onto the battlefield if it’s a permanent card or into its owner’s graveyard if it’s an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell for its madness cost doesn’t change its mana cost or its mana value. You just pay the madness cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less for its madness cost, too.

Madness works independently of why you’re discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or even because you have too many cards in your hand at the end of your turn. You can’t discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.
When you cast a card with madness, it was still discarded. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it’s put into your graveyard. You don’t get another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card’s madness trigger (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while resolving a spell or ability, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability—the card is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness trigger will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

rulings.text: The abilities that transform a Werewolf back and forth look at the entire previous turn, even if the Werewolf with that ability wasn’t on the battlefield for some or all of that turn.

To trigger the Werewolf’s back face’s transform ability, a single player must have cast two or more spells during the previous turn. If multiple players each cast just one spell during the previous turn, the ability won’t trigger.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

Wolf of Devil's Breach.name: Wolf of Devil's Breach
Wolf of Devil's Breach.text: Whenever Wolf of Devil's Breach attacks, you may pay {1}{R} and discard a card. If you do, Wolf of Devil's Breach deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the discarded card's mana value.
Wolf of Devil's Breach.flavor:

Wolf of Devil's Breach.original_text: Whenever Wolf of Devil's Breach attacks, you may pay {1}{R} and discard a card. If you do, Wolf of Devil's Breach deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the discarded card's converted mana cost.

rulings.text: You can’t choose to discard a card without also paying {1}{R}.
If a card with {X} in its mana cost is discarded to Wolf of Devil’s Breach’s ability, X is considered to be 0.

You choose the target creature or planeswalker as the triggered ability of Wolf of Devil’s Breach is put onto the stack. You choose which card to discard, if any, as the ability resolves. While players may respond to the triggered ability once you’ve chosen a target, no player may take actions between the time you discard the card and the time damage is dealt.

Autumnal Gloom // Ancient of the Equinox.flavor:

rulings.text: The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Most triggered delirium abilities use an intervening “if” clause. There must be four or more card types among cards in your graveyard in order for these abilities to trigger, otherwise they never trigger at all. There’s no way to have the ability trigger if there aren’t enough card types, even if you intend to raise that number in response to the triggered ability. The number of card types is checked again as the trigger resolves, and if it has become too low somehow, the ability does nothing. If which card types are in your graveyard changes but the quantity of card types stays the same (or increases), then the delirium triggered ability will still resolve.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

Briarbridge Patrol.name: Briarbridge Patrol
Briarbridge Patrol.text:
Whenever Briarbridge Patrol deals damage to one or more creatures, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
At the beginning of each end step, if you sacrificed three or more Clues this turn, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
Briarbridge Patrol.original_text:
Whenever Briarbridge Patrol deals damage to one or more creatures, investigate. (Put a colorless Clue artifact token onto the battlefield with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
At the beginning of each end step, if you sacrificed three or more Clues this turn, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: Briarbridge Patrol’s first ability will only trigger once per combat damage step, regardless of how many creatures it deals damage to.

Briarbridge Patrol’s second ability looks at the entire turn, even if Briarbridge Patrol wasn’t on the battlefield for some of the turn. It will see Clues sacrificed for any reason, not just Clues sacrificed to their own ability.
The token is named Clue and has the artifact subtype Clue. Clue isn’t a creature type.
The tokens are normal artifacts. For example, they can be sacrificed to cast Angelic Purge or targeted by Root Out.
If you sacrifice a Clue for another card’s cost or effect, such as that of Angelic Purge or Tamiyo’s Journal, you can’t also pay {2} and sacrifice it to draw a card.

Confront the Unknown.flavor:
"Never flinch from the truth."
—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
Confront the Unknown.original_text: Investigate, then target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Clue you control. (To investigate, put a colorless Clue artifact token onto the battlefield with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

rulings.text: No player may take any action in between the two steps of Confront the Unknown, so the target creature will get at least +1/+1.
The token is named Clue and has the artifact subtype Clue. Clue isn’t a creature type.
The tokens are normal artifacts. For example, they can be sacrificed to cast Angelic Purge or targeted by Root Out.
If you sacrifice a Clue for another card’s cost or effect, such as that of Angelic Purge or Tamiyo’s Journal, you can’t also pay {2} and sacrifice it to draw a card.
You can’t cast a spell without choosing legal targets. If all of those targets become illegal, the spell doesn’t resolve and you won’t investigate.

foreign_names.name: Das Unbekannte herausfordern

(Um Nachforschungen anzustellen, bringe einen farblosen Hinweis-Artefaktspielstein mit „{2}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Ziehe eine Karte" ins Spiel.)

Crawling Sensation.name: Crawling Sensation
Crawling Sensation.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may mill two cards.
Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.
Crawling Sensation.original_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.
Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere for the first time each turn, put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: If multiple land cards are put into your graveyard at once, Crawling Sensation’s last ability triggers only once. This could happen because an effect (such as that of Crawling Sensation’s first ability) put them there from your library at once, or because they were destroyed at the same time (such as two land creatures that were dealt lethal combat damage).

foreign_names.name: Kribbeln
foreign_names.text:
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments kannst du die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof legen.
Immer wenn zum ersten Mal in einem Zug eine oder mehrere Länderkarten von irgendwoher auf deinen Friedhof gelegt werden, bringe einen 1/1 grünen Insekten-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.

foreign_names.name: Sensación hormigueante
foreign_names.text:
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes poner las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio.
Siempre que una o más cartas de tierra vayan a tu cementerio desde cualquier parte por primera vez cada turno, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Insecto verde 1/1.

foreign_names.name: Sensation rampante
foreign_names.text:
Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez mettre les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière.
À chaque fois qu'au moins une carte de terrain est mise dans votre cimetière d'où qu'elle vienne pour la première fois à chaque tour, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 1/1 verte Insecte.

foreign_names.name: Sensazione Strisciante
foreign_names.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi mettere nel tuo cimitero le prime due carte del tuo grimorio.
Ogniqualvolta una o più carte terra vengono messe nel tuo cimitero da qualsiasi zona per la prima volta in ogni turno, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Insetto 1/1 verde.

foreign_names.name: 蟻走感
foreign_names.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたは「あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードをあなたの墓地に置く。」ことを選んでもよい。
各ターンに最初に１枚以上の土地・カードがいずれかの領域からあなたの墓地に置かれるたび、緑の１/１の昆虫・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。

foreign_names.name: 소름끼치는 느낌
foreign_names.text:
당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신은 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 당신의 무덤에 넣을 수 있다.
매 턴 처음으로 어디에서든 한 개 이상의 대지 카드가 당신의 무덤으로 갈 때마다, 1/1 녹색 곤충 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.

foreign_names.name: Sensação Rastejante
foreign_names.text:
No início de sua manutenção, você pode colocar os dois cards do topo de seu grimório em seu cemitério.
Toda vez que um ou mais cards de terreno forem colocados em seu cemitério vindos de qualquer lugar pela primeira vez em cada turno, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura verde 1/1 do tipo Inseto.

foreign_names.name: Ползучие Мурашки

В начале вашего шага поддержки вы можете положить две верхние карты вашей библиотеки на ваше кладбище.
Каждый раз, когда одна или несколько карт земель откуда угодно попадают на ваше кладбище впервые в каждом ходу, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 1/1 зеленое Насекомое.

foreign_names.name: 蠕爬异感

在你的维持开始时，你可以将你牌库顶的两张牌置入你的坟墓场。
每当每回合中第一次有一张或数张地牌从任何区域置入你的坟墓场时，将一个1/1绿色昆虫衍生生物放进战场。

foreign_names.name: 蠕爬異感
foreign_names.text:
在你的維持開始時，你可以將你牌庫頂的兩張牌置入你的墳墓場。
每當每回合中第一次有一張或數張地牌從任何區域置入你的墳墓場時，將一個1/1綠色昆蟲衍生生物放進戰場。

Cryptolith Rite.name: Cryptolith Rite
Cryptolith Rite.text: Creatures you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
Cryptolith Rite.flavor: The chant was incomprehensible, but its power was unmistakable.
Cryptolith Rite.original_text: Creatures you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

rulings.text: If a creature has multiple mana abilities with a cost of {T}, such as if you control two Cryptolith Rites, you can only activate one of them at a time. Tapping the creature doesn’t produce multiple mana.

foreign_names.flavor: Der Gesang war unverständlich, doch seine Macht war unverkennbar.

foreign_names.name: Rituel de cryptolithe

foreign_names.flavor: La mélopée était incompréhensible, mais sa puissance était indéniable.

foreign_names.name: Rituale del Criptolito

foreign_names.flavor: La litania era incomprensibile, ma il suo potere era innegabile.

foreign_names.name: 謎の石の儀式

foreign_names.flavor: 詠唱は不可解だったが、その効力には間違いがなかった。

foreign_names.name: 신비석 의식

foreign_names.flavor: 외치는 구호는 이해할 수 없었지만 그 힘은 분명히 느낄 수 있었다.

foreign_names.name: Rito do Criptólito

foreign_names.flavor: O canto era incompreensível, mas seu poder era inconfundível.

foreign_names.name: Обряд Криптолита

foreign_names.flavor: Слов песнопения было не разобрать, но в его могуществе не приходилось сомневаться.

foreign_names.name: 秘石仪式
foreign_names.text: 由你操控的生物具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」
foreign_names.flavor: 吟诵高深莫测，力量不容小觑。

foreign_names.name: 秘石儀式

foreign_names.flavor: 吟誦高深莫測，力量不容小覷。

Cult of the Waxing Moon.name: Cult of the Waxing Moon
Cult of the Waxing Moon.text: Whenever a permanent you control transforms into a non-Human creature, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
Cult of the Waxing Moon.flavor: In times of madness, people cling to the familiar, monstrous though it may be.
Cult of the Waxing Moon.original_text: Whenever a permanent you control transforms into a non-Human creature, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: A permanent transforms into a non-Human creature if it transforms and is a creature without the creature type Human after transforming, regardless of whether it was a Human creature (or a creature at all) before it transformed. For example, Westvale Abbey and Thraben Gargoyle will both cause Cult of the Waxing Moon’s ability to trigger when they transform.
A non-Human creature that’s put onto the battlefield transformed, such as Skin Shedder, will not cause Cult of the Waxing Moon’s ability to trigger.

foreign_names.name: Kult des zunehmenden Mondes
foreign_names.text: Immer wenn eine bleibende Karte, die du kontrollierst, in eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur transformiert, bringe einen 2/2 grünen Wolf-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.
foreign_names.flavor: In Zeiten des Wahnsinns klammern sich die Leute an das Vertraute, so monströs es auch sein mag.

foreign_names.name: Culto de la luna creciente

foreign_names.flavor: En tiempos de locura, la gente se aferra a lo conocido, por monstruoso que sea.

foreign_names.name: Culte de la lune croissante

foreign_names.flavor: En ces temps de folie, les gens s'accrochent à ce qui leur est familier, aussi monstrueux que ce soit.

foreign_names.text: Ogniqualvolta un permanente che controlli si trasforma in una creatura non Umano, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Lupo 2/2 verde.
foreign_names.flavor: In tempi di follia, ci si aggrappa a ciò che è familiare, per quanto mostruoso sia.

foreign_names.name: 上弦の月の教団
foreign_names.text: あなたがコントロールするパーマネント１つが人間でないクリーチャーに変身するたび、緑の２/２の狼・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 人間・シャーマン
foreign_names.flavor: 狂った時代には、それが奇怪であろうと、人々は馴染みの考えに固執する。

foreign_names.name: 상현달의 광신단
foreign_names.text: 당신이 조종하는 지속물이 인간이 아닌 생물로 변신할 때마다, 2/2 녹색 늑대 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 광기의 시대에 사람들은 무엇이든 익숙하고 끔찍한 것에 집착한다.

foreign_names.name: Culto da Lua Crescente
foreign_names.text: Toda vez que uma permanente que você controla se transformar em uma criatura que não seja um Humano, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura verde 2/2 do tipo Lobo.
foreign_names.flavor: Em tempos de loucura, as pessoas se apegam ao que é familiar, não importa quão monstruoso seja.

foreign_names.name: Культ Растущей Луны
foreign_names.text: Каждый раз, когда перманент под вашим контролем трансформируется в не являющееся Человеком существо, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 2/2 зеленый Волк.
foreign_names.flavor: Во времена безумия люди тянутся к знакомым, пусть и чудовищным, вещам.

foreign_names.name: 盈月教信徒
foreign_names.text: 每当一个由你操控的永久物转化为非人类的生物时，将一个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物放进战场。
foreign_names.flavor: 在疯狂时期，人们趋于靠近自己熟悉的东西，即使它是个怪物。

foreign_names.name: 盈月教信徒
foreign_names.text: 每當一個由你操控的永久物轉化為非人類的生物時，將一個2/2綠色的狼衍生生物放進戰場。
foreign_names.flavor: 在瘋狂時期，人們趨於靠近自己熟悉的東西，即使它是個怪物。

Deathcap Cultivator.name: Deathcap Cultivator
Deathcap Cultivator.text:
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
Delirium — Deathcap Cultivator has deathtouch as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Deathcap Cultivator.flavor: The old hermit would never say what he fed his mushrooms, and people learned not to ask.
Deathcap Cultivator.original_text:
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.
Delirium — Deathcap Cultivator has deathtouch as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: If you have three noncreature card types among cards in your graveyard at the time damage is dealt by Deathcap Cultivator, and lethal damage is dealt to another creature you control at the same time, the damage from Deathcap Cultivator won’t be from a source with deathtouch.

The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

foreign_names.name: Giftpilzzüchter
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {B} oder {G}.
Delirium — Der Giftpilzzüchter hat Todesberührung, solange dein Friedhof vier oder mehr unterschiedliche Kartentypen enthält.
foreign_names.flavor: Der alte Einsiedler hat nie erzählt, womit er seine Pilze züchtete, und die Leute fragten lieber nicht danach.

foreign_names.name: Cultivador de muertehongos
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Agrega {B} o {G} a tu reserva de maná.
Delirio — El Cultivador de muertehongos tiene la habilidad de toque mortal mientras entre las cartas de tu cementerio haya cuatro o más tipos de cartas.
foreign_names.flavor: El viejo ermitaño jamás contaba con qué alimentaba sus setas, y la gente aprendió a no preguntar.

foreign_names.name: Cultivateur d'oronges brunes
foreign_names.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {G} à votre réserve.
Délire — Le Cultivateur d'oronges brunes a le contact mortel tant qu'il y a au moins quatre types de carte parmi les cartes de votre cimetière.
foreign_names.flavor: Le vieil ermite refusait de dire avec quoi il nourrissait ses champignons, et les gens apprirent à ne pas le lui demander.

foreign_names.name: Coltivatore di Malovoli
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o {G} alla tua riserva di mana.
Delirio — Il Coltivatore di Malovoli ha tocco letale fintanto che ci sono quattro o più tipi di carta tra le carte nel tuo cimitero.
foreign_names.flavor: L'anziano eremita non rivelò mai quale fosse il nutrimento dei suoi funghi e la gente imparò a non fare domande.

foreign_names.name: 死天狗茸の栽培者
foreign_names.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{B}か{G}を加える。
昂揚 ― あなたの墓地にあるカードにカード・タイプが合計４種類以上含まれるかぎり、死天狗茸の栽培者は接死を持つ。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ドルイド
foreign_names.flavor: その世捨て人は、茸に何を与えて育てたかを言うことはなく、また人々もそれを尋ねないようにしていた。

foreign_names.name: 죽음모자 버섯 재배자
foreign_names.text:
{T}: {B} 또는 {G}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
섬망 — 당신의 무덤에 네 개 이상의 카드 유형이 있는 한, 죽음모자 버섯 재배자는 치명타를 가진다.
foreign_names.flavor: 그 늙은 은둔자는 무엇으로 버섯을 재배했는지 절대 밝히지 않을 것이다. 사람들도 물어보면 안 된다는 것을 깨달았다.

foreign_names.name: Cultivador de Cicuta Verde
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Adicione {B} ou {G} à sua reserva de mana.
Delírio — Cultivador de Cicuta Verde terá toque mortífero enquanto houver quatro ou mais tipos de card entre os cards de seu cemitério.
foreign_names.flavor: O velho eremita jamais dizia com o quê alimentava seus cogumelos, e as pessoas aprenderam a não perguntar.

foreign_names.name: Разводчик Поганок
foreign_names.text:
{T}: добавьте {B} или {G} в ваше хранилище маны.
Буйство — Разводчик Поганок имеет Смертельное касание, пока среди карт на вашем кладбище есть не менее четырех типов карт.

Duskwatch Recruiter // Krallenhorde Howl.name: Duskwatch Recruiter // Krallenhorde Howler
Duskwatch Recruiter // Krallenhorde Howl.text:
Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Krallenhorde Howler.
Duskwatch Recruiter // Krallenhorde Howl.original_text:
Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Krallenhorde Howler.

rulings.text: Krallenhorde Howler’s first ability can reduce alternative costs such as madness costs.
You can activate Duskwatch Recruiter’s first ability in response to its triggered ability.
The abilities that transform a Werewolf back and forth look at the entire previous turn, even if the Werewolf with that ability wasn’t on the battlefield for some or all of that turn.
Krallenhorde Howler’s first ability can only reduce the generic mana portion of a creature spell’s cost.

To trigger the Werewolf’s back face’s transform ability, a single player must have cast two or more spells during the previous turn. If multiple players each cast just one spell during the previous turn, the ability won’t trigger.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

Inexorable Blob.name: Inexorable Blob
Inexorable Blob.text: Delirium — Whenever Inexorable Blob attacks, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, create a 3/3 green Ooze creature token that's tapped and attacking.
Inexorable Blob.original_text: Delirium — Whenever Inexorable Blob attacks, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, put a 3/3 green Ooze creature token onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

rulings.text: You declare which player or planeswalker the token is attacking as you put it onto the battlefield. It doesn’t have to be the same player or planeswalker Inexorable Blob is attacking.
Although the token is attacking, it was never declared as an attacking creature (for purposes of abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks, for example).
If an effect gives the token vigilance, the token will still enter the battlefield tapped.

The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Most triggered delirium abilities use an intervening “if” clause. There must be four or more card types among cards in your graveyard in order for these abilities to trigger, otherwise they never trigger at all. There’s no way to have the ability trigger if there aren’t enough card types, even if you intend to raise that number in response to the triggered ability. The number of card types is checked again as the trigger resolves, and if it has become too low somehow, the ability does nothing. If which card types are in your graveyard changes but the quantity of card types stays the same (or increases), then the delirium triggered ability will still resolve.

Kessig Dire Swine.name: Kessig Dire Swine
Kessig Dire Swine.text: Delirium — Kessig Dire Swine has trample as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Kessig Dire Swine.flavor: In the quiet of the Somberwald, new horrors stir.
Kessig Dire Swine.original_text: Delirium — Kessig Dire Swine has trample as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Trample matters only as combat damage is being assigned, before it’s dealt. If Kessig Dire Swine doesn’t have trample while assigning its combat damage, it won’t matter if a creature dying due to combat damage causes Kessig Dire Swine to gain trample.

The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Lambholt Pacifist // Lambholt Butcher.name: Lambholt Pacifist // Lambholt Butcher
Lambholt Pacifist // Lambholt Butcher.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Lambholt Butcher.
Lambholt Pacifist // Lambholt Butcher.flavor: True peace can't be achieved until everyone else is dead.
Lambholt Pacifist // Lambholt Butcher.original_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Lambholt Butcher.

rulings.text: If Lambholt Pacifist’s power becomes 4 or greater, it fulfills its own restriction and can attack.
The abilities that transform a Werewolf back and forth look at the entire previous turn, even if the Werewolf with that ability wasn’t on the battlefield for some or all of that turn.

To trigger the Werewolf’s back face’s transform ability, a single player must have cast two or more spells during the previous turn. If multiple players each cast just one spell during the previous turn, the ability won’t trigger.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

Might Beyond Reason.name: Might Beyond Reason
Might Beyond Reason.text:
Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Delirium — Put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
Might Beyond Reason.original_text:
Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Delirium — Put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

Some delirium abilities that appear on instants and sorceries use the word “instead.” These spells have an upgraded effect when they resolve if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard. They check that number only while they’re resolving and don’t count themselves, since they aren’t in your graveyard yet. You only get the upgraded effect, not both effects.

"When I was a child, we worried about picking the wrong mushrooms for the cook pot. Now we must worry about being picked ourselves."
—Halana, Kessig ranger
Moldgraf Scavenger.original_text: Delirium — Moldgraf Scavenger gets +3/+0 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.
